Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: I should have known that you would be here...Professor McGonagall.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Good evening, Professor Dumbledore. Are the rumours true, Albus?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: I'm afraid so, Professor. The good, and the bad.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: And the boy?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Hagrid is bringing him.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Do you think it wise to trust Hagrid with something as important as this?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Ah, Professor, I would trust Hagrid with my life.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Professor Dumbledore, Sir. Professor McGonagall.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: No problems, I trust, Hagrid?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: No, sir. Little tyke fell asleep just as we were flying over Bristol. Heh. Try not to wake him. There you go.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Albus, do you really think it's safe, leaving him with these people? I've watched them all day. They're the worst sort of Muggles imaginable. They really are...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: The only family he has.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: This boy will be famous. There won't be a child in our world who doesn't know his name.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Exactly. He's better off growing up away from all that. Until he is ready.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: There, there, Hagrid. It's not really goodbye, after all.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Good luck...Harry Potter.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Up. Get up.  Now!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Wake up, cousin! We're going to the zoo!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Oh, here he comes, the birthday boy!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Happy birthday, son.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Why don't you just cook the breakfast, and try not to burn anything.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Yes, Aunt Petunia.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: I want everything to be perfect for my Dudley's special day.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Hurry up! Bring my coffee, boy!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Yes, Uncle Vernon.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Aren’t they wonderful, darling?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: How many are there?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Thirty-six. Counted 'em myself.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Thirty-six?! But last year last year I had thirty-seven!!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Err yes, well, some of them are quite a bit bigger than last year.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: I don't care how big they are!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Oh, now, now, now. This is what we're going to do, is that when we go out, we're going to buy you two new presents! How's that, pumpkin?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: This will be a lovely day at the zoo. I'm really looking forward to it.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: I'm warning you now, boy. Any funny business, any at all, and you won't have any meals for a week. Get in.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Make it move.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Move!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: MOVE!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: He's asleep!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: He's boring.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Sorry about him. He doesn't understand what it's like, lying there day after day, having people press their ugly faces in on you.  Can you...hear me?  It's just...I've never talked to a snake before. Do you...I mean...do you talk to people often?  You're from Burma, aren't you? Was it nice there, do you miss your family?  I see. That's me as well. I never knew my parents, either.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Mummy, dad, come here! You won't believe what this snake is doing!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Whoa! Ahh! Ahh!!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Thanks.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Anytime.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: SNAKE!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Mum, mummy!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: AHH!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Mum, help! Help me!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: My darling boy! How did you get in there?! How did you get in there? Dursley, oh, Dursley!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: It's all right. It's all right.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Ow!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: What happened?!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: I swear I don't know!  One minute, the glass was there and then it was gone! It was like magic!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: There's no such thing as magic!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Awww, smile.  Vernon, just look at him. I can't believe it. In just a week you'll be off to Smeltings.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Caveat Smeltona. Proudest moment of my life.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Will I have to wear that, too?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: What, you? Go to Smeltings?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Ha!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Oh, don't be so stupid, you're going to the state school where you belong.  And this is what you're gonna be wearing when I've finished dyeing it.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: But that's Dudley's old uniform. It'll fit me like bits of old Elephant skin.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: It'll fit you well enough. Go get the post.  Go!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Oh, Marge is ill! Ate a funny whelk.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Dad! Look! Harry's got a letter!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Hey, give it back! It's mine!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Yours? Who'd be writing to you?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: No more mail through this letterbox.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Have a lovely day at the office, dear.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Shoo! Go on!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Fine day Sunday. In my opinion, best day of the week. Why is that, Dudley?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Because there's no post on Sunday?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Ah, right you are, Harry. No post on Sunday. Ha! No blasted letters today. No, sir. Not one single bloody letter, not one.  No, sir, not one blasted, miserable-

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: AHH! Make it stop! Please make it stop!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Go away, ahh!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: What is it? Please tell me what's happening!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Give me that! Give me that letter!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Get off! Ahh!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Ahh!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: They're my letters! Let go of me!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: That's it! We're going away! Far away! Where they can't find us!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Daddy's gone mad, hasn't he?!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Make a wish, Harry.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Who's there? Ahh!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Sorry 'bout that.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: I demand that you leave at once, sir! You are breaking and entering!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Dry up, Dursley, you great prune.  Boy, I haven't seen you since you was a baby, Harry, but you're a bit more along than I would have expected. Particularly 'round the middle!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: I-I-I'm not Harry.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: I-I am.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Oh, well, of course you are! Got something for ya. 'Fraid I might have sat on it at some point! I imagine that it'll taste fine just the same. Ahh. Baked it myself.  Words and all. Heh.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Thank you!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: It's not every day that your young man turns eleven, now is it?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Excuse me, who are you?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Rubeus Hagrid. Keeper of keys and grounds at Hogwarts. Course, you'll know all about Hogwarts.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Sorry, no.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: No? Blimey, Harry, didn't you ever wonder where your mum and dad learned it all?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Learned what?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: You're a wizard, Harry.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: I-I'm a what?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: A wizard. And a thumping good one at that, I'd wager. Once you train up a little.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: No, you've made a mistake. I can't be...a-a wizard. I mean, I'm just... Harry. Just Harry.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Well, just Harry. Did you ever make anything happen? Anything you couldn't explain when you were angry or scared?  Ah.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Dear, Mr. Potter. We are pleased to inform you that you have been accepted at Hogwarts' School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: He'll not be going! We swore when we took him in, we’d put a stop to this rubbish!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: You knew? You knew all along and you never told me?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Of course we knew. How could you not be? My perfect sister being who she was. Oh, my mother and father were so proud the day she got her letter. We have a witch in the family. Isn't it wonderful? I was the only one to see her for what she was. A freak! And then she met that Potter, and then she had you, and I knew you'd be just the same, just as strange, just as ... abnormal. And then, if you please, she went and got herself blown up. And we got landed with you.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Blown up? You told me my parents died in a car crash!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: A car crash? A car crash kill James and Lily Potter?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: We had to tell him something.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: It's an outrage! It's a scandal!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: He'll not be going!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Oh, and I suppose a great Muggle like yourself's going to stop him, are you?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Muggle?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Non magic folk.  This boy's had his name down ever since he was born!  He's going to the finest school of witchcraft and wizardry in the world, and he'll be under the finest headmaster that Hogwarts has ever seen: Albus Dumbledore.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: I will not pay for some crackpot old fool to teach him magic tricks!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Never, insult Albus Dumbledore, in front of me.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Ahh!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Oh, um, I'd appreciate if you didn't tell anyone at Hogwarts about that. Strictly speaking, I'm not allowed to do magic.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Okay.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Ooh, we're a bit behind schedule. Best be off.  Unless you'd rather stay, of course. Hmm?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: First year students will require: three sets of work robes, one wand.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Essential bit of equipment, Harry.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: One pair of dragon-hide gloves.  Hagrid, do they mean for a real dragon?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Well, they don't mean for a penguin, do they? Heh. Crikey, but not a dragon.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: But you like a dragon?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Fast and misunderstood beasts, Harry. Fast and misunderstood.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: All students must be equipped with...one standard size two pewter cauldron and may bring if they desire either an owl, a cat or a toad. Could we find all this in London?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: If you know where to go.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Ah, Hagrid! The usual, I presume?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: No thanks, Tom. I'm on official Hogwarts business today. Just helping young Harry here buy his school supplies.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Bless my soul. It's Harry Potter.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Welcome back, Mr. Potter, welcome back.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Doris Crockford, Mr. Potter. I can't believe I'm meeting you at last.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Harry P-potter. C-can't tell you how pleased I am to meet you.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Hello, Professor. I didn't see you there. Harry, this is Professor Quirrell. He'll be your Defense Against the Dark Arts teacher at Hogwarts.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Oh, nice to meet you.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: F-fearfully fascinating subject. N-not that you need it, e-eh, Potter? Heheh.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Yes, well, must be going now. Lots to buy. Heh.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Goodbye.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: See, Harry, you're famous!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: But why am I famous, Hagrid? All those people back there, how is it they know who I am?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: I'm not exactly sure I'm the right person to tell you that, Harry.  Welcome, Harry, to Diagon Alley.  Here's where you'll get your quills and ink, and over there all your bits and bobs for doing your wizardry.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: It's a world class racing broom. Look at it, it’s the new Nimbus 2000! It's the fastest model yet.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: But, Hagrid, how am I to pay for all this? I haven't any money.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Well, there's your money, Harry.  Gringotts, the Wizard Bank. T'aint no place safer, 'cept perhaps Hogwarts.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Uh, Hagrid, what exactly are these things?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: They're goblins, Harry. Clever as they come goblins, but not the most friendly of beasts. Best stick close to me.  Mr. Harry Potter wishes to make a withdrawal.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: And does Mr. Harry Potter have his key?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Oh. Wait a minute. Got it here somewhere. Hah. There's the little devil.  Oh, and there's something else as well.  Professor Dumbledore gave me this.  It's about you-know-what in vault you-know-which.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Very well.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Vault 687. Lamp, please.  Key please.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Didn't think your mum and dad would leave you with nothing now, did ya?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Vault 713.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: What's in there, Hagrid?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Can't tell you, Harry. It's Hogwarts business. Very secret.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Stand back.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Best not mention this to anyone, Harry.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: I still need...a wand.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: A wand? Well, you'll want Ollivanders.  No place better. Run along there, but wait. I just got one more thing I got to do. Won't be long.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Hello? Hello?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: I wondered when I'd be seeing you, Mr. Potter. It seems only yesterday that your mother and father were in here buying their first wands.  Ah. Here we are.  Well, give it a wave.  Apparently not.  Perhaps this.  No, no, definitely not! No matter...  I wonder.  Curious, very curious.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Sorry, but what's curious?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: I remember every wand I've ever sold, Mr. Potter. It just so happens that the phoenix, whose tail feather resides in your wand gave one other feather, just one. It is curious that you should be destined for this wand when its brother gave you that scar.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: And...who owned that wand?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Oh, we do not speak his name. The wand chooses the wizard, Mr. Potter. It's not always clear why, but I think it is clear that we can expect great things from you. After all, He-Who-Must-Not-Be-Named did great things...terrible, yes, but great.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Harry! Harry! Happy birthday!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Wow.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: You all right, Harry? You seem very quiet.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: He killed my parents, didn't he? The one who gave me this. You know, Hagrid, I know you do.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: First, and understand this, Harry, 'cause it's very important. Not all wizards are good. Some of them go bad. A few years ago, there was one wizard who went as bad as you can go. And his name was V-...his name was V-...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Maybe if you wrote it down?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: No, I can't spell it. All right.  Voldemort.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Voldemort?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Shh!!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: It was dark times, Harry, dark times.  Voldemort started to gather some followers, brought 'em over to the dark side. Anyone that stood up to him ended up dead. Your parents fought against him, but nobody lived once he decided to kill 'em.  Nobody...not one. ‘Cept you.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Me? Voldemort tried to kill...me?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Yes. That ain't no ordinary cut on your forehead, Harry. A mark like that only comes from being touched by a curse...and an evil curse at that.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: What happened to...to You-Know-Who?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Well, some say he died. Codswallop in my opinion. Nope, I reckon he's out there, still, too tired to go on. But one thing's absolutely certain. Something about you stumped him that night. That's why you're famous. That's why everybody knows your name. You're the boy who lived.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: What're you looking at?  Blimey, is that the time? Sorry, Harry, I'm gonna have to leave you. Dumbledore'll be wanting his- well, he'll be wanting to see me. Now, uh, your train leaves in 10 minutes. Here's your ticket.  Stick to it, Harry that's very important. Stick to your ticket.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Platform 9¾? But, Hagrid, there must be a mistake. This says Platform 9¾. There's no such thing...is there?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Sorry.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Excuse me, excuse me.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Right on your left, ma'am.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Excuse me, sir. Can you tell me where I might find Platform 9¾?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: 9¾? Think you're being funny, do ya?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: It's the same year after year. Always packed with Muggles, of course.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Muggles?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Come on. Platform 9¾ this way! All right, Percy, you first.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Fred, you next.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: He's not Fred, I am!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Honestly, woman, you call yourself our mother.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Oh, I'm sorry, George.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: I'm only joking. I am Fred.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Excuse me! C-could you tell me how to-

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: How to get on the platform? Yes, not to worry, dear. It's Ron's first time to Hogwarts as well.  Now, all you've got to do is walk straight at the wall between platforms 9 and 10. Best do it at a bit of a run if you're nervous.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Good luck.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Excuse me, do you mind? Everywhere else is full.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: No, not at all.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: I'm Ron, by the way. Ron Weasley.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: I'm Harry. Harry Potter.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: So-so it's true? I mean, do you really have the...the...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: This is light?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Of course! Here it is!  "Nicholas Flamel is the only known maker of the Philosopher's Stone!"

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: The what?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: The what?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Honestly, don't you two read? "The Philosopher's Stone is a legendary substance with astonishing powers. It will turn any metal into pure gold and produces the Elixir of Life, which will make the drinker immortal."

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Immortal?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: It means you'll never die.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: I know what it means!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Shh!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: "The only stone currently in existence belongs to Mr. Nicholas Flamel, the noted alchemist, who last year celebrated his 665th birthday!" That's what Fluffy's guarding on the 3rd floor. That's what's under the trapdoor...the Philosopher's Stone!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Hagrid!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Oh, hello. Sorry, don't wish to be rude, but I'm in no fit state to entertain today.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: We know about the Philosopher's Stone!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: We know about the Philosopher's Stone!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: We know about the Philosopher's Stone!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Oh.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: We think Snape's trying to steal it.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Snape? Blimey, Harry, you're not still on about him, are you?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Hagrid, we know he's after the Stone. We just don't know why.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Snape is one of the teachers protecting the Stone! He's not about to steal it!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: What?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: You heard. Right. Come on, now, I'm a bit preoccupied today.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Wait a minute.  One of the teachers?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Of course! There are other things defending the Stone, aren't there? Spells, enchantments.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: That's right. Waste of bloody time, if you ask me.  Ain't no one gonna get past Fluffy. Hehe, not a soul knows how. Except for me and Dumbledore. I shouldn't have told you that. I shouldn't have told you that.  Oh!  Ooh! Ooh! Ooh! Ooh!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Uh, Hagrid, what exactly is that?

Harry Potter.text: That? It's a ... its um...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: I know what that is! But Hagrid, how did you get one?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: I won it. Off a stranger I met down at a pub. Seemed quite glad to be rid off it, as a matter of fact.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Is that...a dragon?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: That's not just a dragon. That's a Norwegian Ridgeback! My brother Charlie works with these in Romania.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Isn't he beautiful? Oh. Bless him, look. He knows his mummy. Hehe. Hallo, Norbert.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Norbert?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Yeah, well, he's got to have a name, doesn't he?  Don't you, Norbert?  Dededede.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Ohh!  Oooh, ooh, ooh, well...he'll have to be trained up a bit, of course.  Who's that?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Malfoy.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Oh, dear.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Hagrid always wanted a dragon. He told me so the first time I met him.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: It's crazy. And worse, Malfoy knows.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: I don't understand. Is that bad?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: It's bad.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Good evening.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Nothing, I repeat, nothing gives a student the right to walk about the school at night. Therefore, as punishment for your actions, 50 points will be taken.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Each.  And to ensure it doesn't happen again, all four of you will receive detention.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Excuse me, Professor. Perhaps I heard you wrong. I thought you said..."the four of us."

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: No, you heard me correctly, Mr. Malfoy. You see, as honorable as your intentions were, you too were out of bed after hours. You will serve detention with your classmates.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: A pity they let the old punishments die. There was a time detention would find you hanging by your thumbs in the dungeons. God, I miss the screaming.  You'll be serving detention with Hagrid tonight. He's got a little job to do inside the dark forest.  A sorry lot this, Hagrid. Oh, good God, man, you're not still on about that bloody dragon, are you?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Norbert's gone. Dumbledore sent him off to Romania to live in a colony.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Well, that's good, isn't it? He'll be with his own kind.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Yeah, but what if he don't like Romania?  What if the other dragons are mean to him? He's only a baby, after all.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Oh, for Gods sake, pull yourself together, man. You're going into the forest, after all. Got to have your wits about you.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: The forest? I thought that was a joke! We can't go in there. Students aren't allowed. And there are......werewolves!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: There's more than werewolves in those trees, lad. You can be sure of that.  Nighty-night.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Right. Let's go.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Hagrid, what's that?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: What we're here for. See that? That's unicorn's blood, that is. I found one dead a few weeks ago. Now, this one's been injured bad by something.  So, it's our job to find the poor beast. Ron, Hermione, you'll come with me.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Okay.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: And Harry, you'll go with Malfoy.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Okay. Then I get Fang!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Fine. Just so you know, he's a bloody coward.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: You wait till my father hears about this. This is servant's stuff.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Scared, Potter?!  Did you hear that? Come on, Fang. Scared.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: What is it, Fang?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: HELP!!!!!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Harry Potter, you must leave. You are known to many creatures here. The forest is not safe at this time. Especially for you.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: But what was that thing you saved me from?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: A monstrous creature. It is a terrible crime to slay a unicorn. Drinking the blood of a unicorn will keep you alive even if you are an inch from death. But at a terrible price. You have slain something so pure that the moment the blood touches your lips, you will have a half-life. A cursed life.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: But who would choose such a life?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Can you think of no one?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Do you mean to say...that that thing that killed the unicorn...that was drinking its blood...that was Voldemort?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Do you know what is hidden in the school at this very moment?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: The Philosopher's Stone.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Harry!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Hello there, Firenze. I see you've met our young Mr. Potter. You all right there, Harry?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Harry Potter, this is where I leave you. You're safe now. Good luck.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: You mean You-Know-Who's out there, right now, in the forest?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: But he's weak. He's living off the unicorns. Don't you see? We had it wrong! Snape doesn't want the Stone for himself; he wants the Stone for Voldemort. With the Elixir of Life, Voldemort will be strong again. He'll... he'll come back.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: But, if he comes back, you don't think he'll try to... kill you, do you?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: I think if he'd had the chance, he might've tried to kill me tonight.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: And to think I've been worrying about my Potions final.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Hang on a minute.  We're forgetting one thing. Who's the one wizard Voldemort always feared? Dumbledore. As long as Dumbledore's around, Harry, you're safe. As long as Dumbledore's around, you can't be touched.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: I've always heard Hogwarts' end of the year exams were frightful, but I found that rather enjoyable.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Speak for yourself. All right there, Harry?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: My scar. It keeps burning.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: It's happened before.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Not like this.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: I think it's a warning. It means dangers coming. Uhh!  Oh. Of course!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: What is it?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Don't you think it's a bit odd that what Hagrid wants more than anything is a dragon, and a stranger shows up and just happens to have one?  I mean, how many people wander around with dragon eggs in their pockets? Why didn't I see it before? Hagrid, who gave you the dragon egg?  What did he look like?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: I don't know. I never saw his face. He kept his hood up.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: The stranger, though, you and he must have talked.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Well, he wanted to know what sort of creatures I looked after. I told him. I said, "After Fluffy, a dragon's gonna be no problem."

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: And did he seem interested in Fluffy?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Well, of course he was interested in Fluffy! How often do you come across a three headed dog, even if you're in the trade? But I told him. I said, "The trick with any beast is to know how to calm him. Take Fluffy, for example, just play him a bit of music and he falls straight to sleep."

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: I shouldn't have told you that. Where you going?! Wait!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: We have to see Professor Dumbledore, immediately!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: I'm afraid Professor Dumbledore is not here. He received an urgent owl from the Ministry of Magic and left immediately for London.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: He's gone?! Now? But this is important! It's about...the Philosopher's Stone.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: How do you know ?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Someone's going to try and steal it.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: I don't know how you three found out about the stone, but I can assure you it is perfectly well-protected. Now would you go back to your dormitories? Quietly.

Harry Potter.text: That was no stranger Hagrid met in the village. It was Snape, which means he knows how to get past Fluffy.

Harry Potter.text: And with Dumbledore gone

Harry Potter.text: Uh...we were just...

Harry Potter.text: You want to be careful. People will think you're  up to something.

Harry Potter.text: Now what do we do?

Harry Potter.text: Now, Neville, listen. We were

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Sorry.

Harry Potter.text: Ow! You stood on my foot!

Harry Potter.text: Sorry.

Harry Potter.text: Alohomora.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: We have to move its paw.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Come on!  Okay. Push!  I'll go first. Don't follow until I give you a sign.  If something bad happens, get yourselves out...Does it seem a bit...quiet?

Harry Potter.text: The harp. It stopped playing.

Harry Potter.text: Harry!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Help!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Help! Help me!

Harry Potter.text: We've got to do something!

Harry Potter.text: What?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Help!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Ahhh!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Ron, are you okay?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Yeah.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Okay.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Whew. Lucky we didn't panic!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Lucky Hermione pays attention in Herbology.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: What is that?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: I don't know. Sounds like wings.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: What's this all about?

Harry Potter.text: I don't know. Strange.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Alohomora!  Well, it was worth a try.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone

Harry Potter.text: We're looking for a big old fashioned one. Probably rusty like the handle.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: What's wrong, Harry?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: It's too simple.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Oh, go on, Harry! If Snape can catch it on that old broomstick, you can! You're the youngest seeker in a century!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: This complicates things a bit!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Hurry up!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: I don't like this. I don't like this at all.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Where are we? A graveyard.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: This is no graveyard.  It's a chessboard.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: There's the door.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Now what do we do?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: It's obvious, isn't it? We've got to play our way across the room. All right. Harry, you take the Bishop's square. Hermione, you'll be the Queen's side castle. As for me, I'll be a knight.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: What happens now?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Well, white moves first, and then...we play.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: You there! D-5!  Yes, Hermione, I think this is going to be exactly like wizard's chess!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Castle to E-4! Smash! Ron: Pawn to C-3! Smash! Boom! The Queen turns, and smashes a piece! Harry, Ron and Hermione wince. The Queen turns again. Both Ron and Harry study the game.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Wait a minute.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: No, Ron! No!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: What is it?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: No, Ron, you can't!  There must be another way!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Do you want to stop Snape or not? Harry, it's you that has to go on. I know it. Not me, not Hermione, you.  Knight...to H-3.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Check.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Ahhhh!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Not as good as you.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Yes. He does seem the type, doesn’t he? Next to him, who would suspect p-p-p-poor st-stuttering Professor Quirrell?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: But-but that day, during the Quidditch match, Snape tried to kill me.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: No, dear boy. I tried to kill you.  And trust me, if Snape’s cloak hadn’t caught fire and broken my eye contact, I would have succeeded, even with Snape muttering his little countercurse.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Snape was trying to save me?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: I knew you were a danger to me right from the off. Especially after Halloween.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Then-then you let the troll in.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Very good, Potter, yes. Snape, unfortunately, wasn’t fooled. While everyone else was running about the dungeon, he went to the third floor to head me off. He, of course, never trusted me again.  He rarely left me alone. But he doesn’t understand. I’m never alone, never.  Now, what does this mirror do? I see what I desire. I see myself holding the stone. But how do I get it?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Use the boy.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Come here, Potter. Now!  Tell me... what do you see?  What is it?  What do you see?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: I-I’m shaking hands with Dumbledore. I’ve won the House Cup.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: He lies.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Tell the truth! What do you see?!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Let me speak to him.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Master, you are not strong enough.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: I have strength enough for this.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Harry Potter, we meet again.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Voldemort.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Yes. You see what I’ve become? See what I must do to survive? Live off another, a mere parasite. Unicorn blood can sustain me, but it cannot give me a body of my own. But there is something that can, something that, conveniently enough, lies in your pocket.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Stop him.  Don't be a fool! Why suffer a horrific death when you can join me and live?!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Never!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Haha. Bravery. Your parents had it too. Tell me, Harry, would you like to see your mother and father again? Together, we can bring them back.  All I ask for is something in return.  That's it, Harry. There is no good and evil. There is only power, and those too weak to seek it. Together, we'll do extraordinary things. Just give me the stone!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: You liar!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Kill him!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Ahh! Ahh!  What is this magic?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Fool! Get the stone!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Good afternoon, Harry. Ah. Tokens from your admirers?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Admirers?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: What happened down in the dungeons between you and Professor Quirrell is a complete secret, so, naturally, the whole school knows.  Ah, I see your friend Ronald has saved you the trouble of opening your Chocolate Frogs.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Ron was here? Is he all right? What about Hermione?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Fine. They're both just fine.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: But, what happened to the Stone?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Relax, dear boy. The stone has been destroyed. My friend Nicholas and I had a little chat and agreed it was best all around.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: But Flamel, he'll die, won't he?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: He has enough Elixir to set his affairs in order. But yes, he will die.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: How is it I got the Stone, sir? One minute I was staring in the mirror, and the next...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Ah. You see, only a person who wanted to find the Stone, find it, but not use it, would be able to get it. That is one of my more brilliant ideas. And between you and me that's saying something.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Does that mean, with the Stone gone, I mean, that Voldemort can never come back?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Ah, I'm afraid there are ways in which he can return. Harry, do you know why Professor Quirrell couldn't bear to have you touch him?  It was because of your mother. She sacrificed herself for you, and that kind of act leaves a mark.  No, no, this kind of mark cannot be seen. It lives in your very skin.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: What is it?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Love, Harry, love.  Ah. Bertie Bott's Every Flavor Beans. I was most unfortunate in my youth to come across a vomit flavored one, and since then I have lost my liking for them. But I think I could be safe with a nice toffee... Mm. Alas. Earwax.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: All right there, Ron?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: All right? You?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: All right. Hermione?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Never better.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Another year, gone! And now, as I understand it, the house cup needs awarded and the points stand thus. In fourth place: Gryffindor, with 312 points!  In third place: Hufflepuff, with 352 points!  Second: Ravenclaw, with 426 points!  And in first place, with 472 points: Slytherin house!  Yes, well done Slytherin, well done Slytherin. However, recent events must be taken into account and I have a few last minute points to award.  First, to Miss Hermione Granger, for the cool use of intellect while others were in grave peril: fifty points!  Second, to Mr Ronald Weasley, for the best played game of chess that Hogwarts has seen these many years: fifty points!  And third, to mister Harry Potter, for pure love and outstanding courage, I award Gryffindor house: sixty points!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: We're tied with Slytherin!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: And finally: it takes a great deal of bravery to stand up to your enemies, but a great deal more to stand up to your friends. I award ten points to Neville Longbottom!  Assuming that my calculations are correct, I believe that a change of decoration is in order!  Gryffindor wins the House Cup!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Yes!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Neville!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Yeah! We won!!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Come on now, hurry up. You'll be late. Train's leaving. Go on. Go on. Come on. Hurry up.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Come on, Harry.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: One minute.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Thought you were leaving without saying good-bye, didja?  This is for you.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Thanks, Hagrid.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Oh. Go on...on with you.  Oh, listen, Harry, if that dolt of a cousin of yours, Dudley, gives you any grief, you could always, um, threaten him with a nice pair of ears to go with that tail of his.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: But Hagrid, we're not allowed to do magic away from Hogwarts. You know that.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: I do. But your cousin don't, do he? Eh?  Off you go.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: Feels strange to be going home, doesn't it?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter.text: I'm not going home. Not really.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: I can't let you out, Hedwig. I'm not allowed to use magic outside of school. Besides, if Uncle Vernon…

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Harry Potter!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Now you've done it.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: He's in there. Vernon…

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: I'm warning you, if you can't control that bloody bird it'll have to go.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: But she's bored! If I could only let outonly let out for an hour or two.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Huh, huh! So you could send secret messages to you freaky little friends. No, sir!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: But I haven't had any messages from any of my friends… not one… all summer.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Who'd want to be friends with you?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: I should think you'd be a little more grateful. We've raised you since you were a baby, given you the food off our table, even let you have Dudley's second bedroom, purely out of the goodness of our hearts.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Not now, Bopkins. For when the Masons arrive.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Which should be any minute! Ahem…Now let's go over our schedule once again, shall we? Petunia when the Masons arrive you will be…?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: …in the lounge, waiting to welcome them graciously into our home.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Good! And- and Dudley, you will be…?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: I'll be waiting to open the door!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Excellent! …And you…?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: I'll be in my bedroom, making no noise and pretending that I don't exist.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Too right, you will. With any luck, this could well be the day I make the biggest deal of my career. And you will not mess it up!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Mr. and Mrs. Mason! Do come in!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Ha- ha- ha! Ha, ha! Ho, ho, ho! Ha, ha! Harry Potter! Such an honor it is!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Who are you?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Dobby sir, Dobby the house elf.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Not to be to be rude or anything, but this isn't a great time for me to have a house elf in my bedroom.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Oh, oh yes, sir! Dobby understands! It's just that, Dobby has come to tell you- it is difficult, sir- Dobby wonders where to begin?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Why don't you sit down?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: S-sit down? S-sit- sit down? Oh, oh, ho. Oh, ho, ho… Oh, ho, ho. Ohh, ho, hoo…

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Dobby, ssh! I'm sorry! I didn't mean to offend you, or anything.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Offend Dobby? Dobby has heard of your greatness, sir, but never has he been asked to sit down by a wizard, like an equal.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: You can't have met many decent wizards then.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: No, I haven't. That was an awful thing to say. Bad Dobby!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Stop, Dobby!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Bad Dobby!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Dobby, shh!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Baaad Dobby!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Dobby, please stop!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Ohh, don't mind that! It's just the cat.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Bad Dobby. Bad Dobby!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Stop! Stop, Dobby. Please be quiet! Are you all right?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Dobby had to punish himself, sir. Dobby almost spoke ill of his family, sir.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Your family?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: The wizard family Dobby serves, sir. Dobby is bound to serve one family forever. If they ever knew Dobby was here…ooh… But Dobby had to come. Dobby has to protect Harry Potter- to warn him. Harry Potter must not go back to Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry this year! There is a plot, a plot to make most terrible things happen.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: What terrible things? Who's plotting them?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Ooo… er… can't… say… argh...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Ok– I- understand. You can't- say.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Don't make me talk, I— Errr…

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Dobby! Dobby, put the lamp down.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Bad Dobby.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: So when they arrive at the ninth hole…

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Give me the lamp! Dobby stop!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Let me go!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Get in there, and keep quiet!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: What the devil are you doing up here?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: I- I was just—

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: You just ruined the punch line of my Japanese golfer joke!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Sorry.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: One more sound, and you'll wish you'd never been born, boy! And fix that door!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Yes, sir… See why I've got to go back? I don't belong here. I belong in your world, at Hogwarts. It's the only place I've got friends!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Friends who don't even write to Harry Potter?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Well, I expect they've… been- hang on- how do you know my friends haven't been writing to me?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Harry Potter mustn't be angry with Dobby. Heh- Dobby hoped, if Harry Potter thought his friends had forgotten him, Harry Potter might not want to go back to school, sir.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Give me those, now!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: No! Ahh! Ooh…

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Dobby, get back here!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Dobby, please, no!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Harry Potter must say he's not going back to school!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: I can't. Hogwarts is my home!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Then, Dobby must do it, sir, for Harry Potter's own good.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: …it spread as far as the eye could see, all over the floor of this vast building, and it was this deep. And one plumber said “Look at all that water.” A-and the second plumber said, “Yes, and that's just the top of it!”

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: I'm so sorry! It's my nephew- he's very disturbed. Meeting strangers upsets him. That's why I kept him upstairs!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: You're never going back to that school. You're never going to see those freaky friends of yours again. Never!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Ron! Fred. George. What are you all doing here?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Rescuing you, of course. Now, come on. Get your trunk!…

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: You'd better stand back. Let's go!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Oh!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Now, what the hell's he doing? Potter!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Dad! What's going on?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Go, go, go, go!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Dad, hurry up!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Come on.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Come on.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Come on, Harry! Hurry up!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Petunia, he's escaping!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Ahh- ahh!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: I've got you Harry!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Come here!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Let go of me!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Oh no, boy! You and that bloody pigeon aren't going anywhere!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Get off!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Drive!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Right.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Right!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: No! No! No! No! Aaaah!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Aaah!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Aaah!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Dad!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Oh… Damn.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Come on. Okay, come on. Shh! Shh! Ok, come on. Shh! Come on.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Do you think it'd be all right if we had some of this?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Yeah, Mum would never know.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: It's not much, but it's home.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: I think it's brilliant

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Where have you been? Harry, how wonderful to see you dear. Beds empty! No note! Car gone! You could have died! You could have been seen! Of course, I don't blame you, Harry dear.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: They were starving him, Mum. There were bars on his window!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Well, you'd best hope that I don't put bars on your window, Ronald Weasley! Come on Harry, time for a spot of breakfast. Here we are Harry. Now tuck in! That's it. There we go.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Mum- Mummy, have you seen my jumper?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Yes dear. It was on the cat.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Hello. W-what did I do?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Ginny. She's been talking about you all summer. A bit annoying really.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Morning, Weasleys.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Morning, Dad.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Morning, Dad.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Morning, Dad.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Morning Arthur!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: What a night. Nine raids. Nine!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Raids?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Dad works in the Ministry of Magic, in the Misuse of Muggle Artifacts Office. Dad loves Muggles, thinks they're fascinating.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Well now. Aah! And who are you?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Oh, sorry sir. I'm Harry, sir, Harry Potter.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Good Lord! Are you really? Well, Ron's told us all about you, of course. When did he get here?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: This morning. Your sons flew that enchanted car of yours to Surrey and back last night.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Did you really? How'd it go? Did you—

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Oh, it…

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Oh, it…

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Oh, it…

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Oh, it…

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Arthur!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: I mean…that was very wrong, indeed, boys. Very wrong of you. Now, Harry, you must know all about Muggles. Tell me, what exactly is the function of a rubber duck?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Oh, umm…

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Well, that'll be Errol with the post. Oh, fetch it will you Percy, please?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Errol…

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: He's always doing that.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Oh look, it's our Hogwarts letters. And they've sent us Harry's as well.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Dumbledore must know you're here, Harry. Doesn't miss a trick, that man.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Oh, no.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: This lot won't come cheap, Mum. The spell books alone are very expensive.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: We'll manage. There's only one place we're going to get all of this. Diagon Alley.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Right. Here we are Harry, you go first dear.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: But Harry's never traveled by Floo powder before, Mum.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Floo powder?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Oh, well you go first Ron, so that Harry can see how it's done. Yes. In you go… That's it.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Diagon Alley!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: You see? It's quite easy, dear. Don't be afraid. Come on. Come on. In you go. That's it, mind your head. That's right. Now take your Floo powder. That's it, very good. Now, don't forget to speak very, very clearly.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: 'Diaganilly.'

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: What did he say, dear?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: 'Diaganilly.'

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: I thought he did.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Ah, ha-ha-ha-ha…

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Not lost are you, my dear?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: I'm fine, thank you. I- I was just…

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Come with us. We'll help you find your way back.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: No! Please!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Harry?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Hagrid!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Ravenclaws, follow me!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: She's not dead, Argus. She has been Petrified.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Ah, thought so. So unlucky I wasn't there. I know exactly the counter curse that could have spared her.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
