Harry Potter.text: But how she has been Petrified, I cannot say…

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Ask him. It's him who's done it. You saw what he wrote on the wall.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: It's not true sir, I swear. I never touched Mrs. Norris.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Rubbish!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: If I might, Headmaster? Perhaps Potter and his friends were simply in the wrong place at the wrong time. However, the circumstances are suspicious. I, for one, don't recall seeing Potter at dinner.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: I'm afraid that's my doing, Severus. You see, Harry was helping me answer my fan mail.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: That's why Ron and I went looking for him, Professor. We'd just found him when he said…

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Yes, Miss Granger?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: When I said I wasn't hungry. We were heading back to the common room when we found Mrs. Norris.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Innocent until proven guilty, Severus.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: My cat has been Petrified. I wanna see some punishment!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: We will be able to cure her, Argus. As I understand it, Madame Sprout has a very healthy growth of Mandrakes. When matured, a potion will be made which will revive Mrs. Norris. And in the meantime, I strongly recommend caution… to all.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: It's a bit strange, isn't it?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Strange?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: You hear this voice, a voice only you can hear, and then Mrs. Norris turns up Petrified. It's just… strange.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Do you think I should have told them? Dumbledore and the others, I mean?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Are you mad?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: No, Harry. Even in the wizarding world, hearing voices isn't a good sign.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: She's right, you know.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Could I have your attention, please? Right. Now, today, we will be transforming animals into water goblets. Like so. One, two, three, Vera verto. Now it's your turn. Well, who would like to go first? Ah! Mr. Weasley. “One, two, three. Vera verto.”

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Ahem. Vera verto!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Ha, ha, ha, ha, ha…

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: That wand needs replacing, Mr. Weasley. Yes, Miss Granger?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Professor, I was wondering if you could tell us about…the Chamber of Secrets?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Well, very well. Well, you all know, of course, that Hogwarts was founded over a thousand years ago by the four greatest witches and wizards of the age: Godric Gryffindor, Helga Hufflepuff, Rowena Ravenclaw, and Salazar Slytherin. Now, three of the founders coexisted quite harmoniously. One did not.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Three guesses who.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Salazar Slytherin wished to be more selective about the students admitted to Hogwarts. He believed magical learning should be kept within all-magic families. In other words, “pure-bloods.” Unable to sway the others, he decided to leave the school. Now, according to legend, Slytherin had built a hidden chamber in this castle, known as the Chamber of Secrets. Though, shortly before departing, he sealed it until that time when his own true heir returned to the school. The heir alone would be able to open the Chamber and unleash the horror within, and by so doing purge the school of all those who, in Slytherin's view, were unworthy to study magic.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Muggle-borns.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Well, naturally, the school had been searched many times. No such chamber has been found.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Professor? What exactly does legend tell us lies within the Chamber?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Well, the Chamber is said to home to something that only the Heir of Slytherin can control. It is said to be the home of a monster.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: D'you think it's true? D'you think there really is a Chamber of Secrets?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Yes. Couldn't you tell? McGonagall's worried. All the teachers are.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Well, if there really is a Chamber of Secrets, a-and it really has been opened, then that means---

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: The Heir of Slytherin has returned to Hogwarts. The question is, who is it?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Let's think. Who do we know who thinks all Muggle-borns are scum?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: If you're talking about Malfoy.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Of course. You heard him! 'You'll be next Mudbloods,'

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: I heard him. But Malfoy, the Heir of Slytherin?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Well, maybe Ron's right, Hermione. I mean, look at his family. The whole lot of them have been in Slytherin for centuries.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Crabbe and Goyle must know. Maybe we could trick them into telling.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Even they aren't that thick. But there might be another way. Mind you, it would be difficult. Not to mention, we would be breaking about fifty school rules. And, it'll be dangerous. Very dangerous.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Here it is. 'The Polyjuice Potion.'  'Properly brewed, the Polyjuice Potion allows the drinker to transform himself temporarily into the physical form of another.'

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Do you mean, if Harry and I drink that stuff, we'll turn into Crabbe and Goyle?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Yes.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Wicked! Malfoy'll tell us anything.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Exactly. But it's tricky. I've never seen a more complicated potion.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Well, how long will it take to make?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: A month.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: A month? But, Hermione, if Malfoy is the Heir of Slytherin, he could attack half the Muggle-borns in the school by then.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: I know. But it's the only plan we've got.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Yeah! Come on Slytherin!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Another goal for Slytherin! They lead Gryffindor ninety to thirty!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Yeah! Yeah!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: All right there, Scarhead?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Watch yourself, Harry!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Wood! Look out!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Blimey! Harry's got himself a rogue Bludger! That's been tampered with, that has!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: I'll stop it.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: No! Even with a proper wand it's too risky. You could hit Harry!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Training for the ballet, Potter?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: You'll never catch me, Potter!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Let's go.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Harry Potter has caught the Snitch! Gryffindor wins!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Finite incantatem!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Thank you.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Are you okay?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: No, I think my- I think my arm's broken.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Not to worry, Harry. I will fix that arm of yours straight away.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: No, not you.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Oh, poor boy doesn't know what he's saying. Now, this… won't hurt a bit. Brackium emendo!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Oh! Ooh! Ugh!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Ah, yes, well, ha, that can sometimes happen, um, butuh, the point is, uh,…

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Ohh! Uhh!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: …you can no longer feel any pain, and, heh- very clearly, the bones are not broken.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Broken? There's no bones left!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Uh-huh-ugh!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Much more flexible, though.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Uhh, uhhh…

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Oh, Mr. Malfoy, stop making such a fuss, you can go. Out of my way. Out of my way! Should've been brought straight to me. I can mend bones in a heartbeat- but growing them back…

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: You will be able to, won't you?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Oh, I'll be able to, certainly. But it'll be painful. You're in for a rough night, Potter. Regrowing bones is a nasty business.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Ugh!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Well, what do you expect? Pumpkin juice?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Uh!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Kill. Kill… Time to kill!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Hello!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Dobby?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Harry Potter should have listened to Dobby! Harry Potter should have gone back home when he missed the train.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: It was you… You stopped the barrier from letting Ron and me through.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Indeed. Yes, sir.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: You nearly got Ron and me expelled!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: At least you would be away from here. Harry Potter must go home! Dobby thought his Bludger would be enough to make Harry Potter see that---

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Your Bludger? You made that Bludger chase after me?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Uhuh… Dobby feels most aggrieved, sir. Dobby had to iron his hands.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: You'd better clear off before my bones come back, Dobby, or I might strangle you!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Uh-huh-huh… Dobby is used to death threats sir. Dobby gets them five times a day at home.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: I don't suppose you could tell me why you're trying to kill me?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Not kill you, sir, never kill you! Dobby remembers how it was before Harry Potter triumphed over He-Who-Must-Not-Be-Named. We house elves were treated like vermin, sir. Of course, Dobby is still treated like vermin…uh, huh, huh, huh! Aah, ahh…

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Why do you wear that thing Dobby?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: This, sir? It is a mark of the house-elves' enslavement. Dobby can only be freed if his master presents him with clothes. Ah! Listen. Listen! Terrible things are about to happen at Hogwarts. Harry Potter must not stay here, now that history is to repeat itself.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Repeat itself? You mean this has happened before?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Ah! I shouldn't have said that! Oh! Ah! Dah! Bad Dobby! Bad!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Dobby, stop it! Stop it! Stop, Dobby! Tell me, Dobby. When did this happen before? Who's doing it now?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Dobby cannot say, sir. Dobby only wants Harry Potter to be safe.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: No, Dobby. Tell me. Who is it?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Put him here. What happened?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: There's been another attack.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: I think- do ya know- I think he's been Petrified, Madame Pomfrey. Look! Perhaps he managed to take a picture of his attacker…

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: What can this mean, Albus?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: It means…that our students are in great danger.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: What should I tell the staff.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: The truth. Tell them Hogwarts is no longer safe. It is as we feared, Minerva. The Chamber of Secrets has indeed been opened again.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Again? You mean the Chamber of Secrets has been opened before?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Of course. Don't you see? Lucius Malfoy must have opened it when he was at school here. And now he's taught Draco how to do it.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Maybe. We'll have to wait for the Polyjuice Potion to know for sure.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Enlighten me. Why are we brewing this potion in broad daylight, in the middle of a girl's lavatory? Don't you think we'll get caught?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Heh… No. No one ever comes in here.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Why?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Moaning Myrtle.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Who?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Moaning Myrtle.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Who's Moaning Myrtle?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: I'm Moaning Myrtle! I wouldn't expect you to know me! Who would ever talk about ugly, miserable, moping Moaning Myrtle? Huh…aaaah!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: She's a little sensitive.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Gather 'round, gather 'round! Can everybody see me? Can you all hear me? Excellent! In light of the dark events of recent weeks, Professor Dumbledore has granted me permission to start this little Dueling Club to train you all up in case you ever need to defend yourselves, as I myself have done on countless occasions- for full details, see my published works. Let me introduce my assistant, Professor Snape. He has sportingly agreed to help me with a short demonstration. Now, I don't want any of you youngsters to worry- you'll still have your Potions master when I'm through with him, never fear. One, two, three.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Expelliarmus!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Whoaah!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Do you think he's all right?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Who cares?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: An excellent idea to show them that, Professor Snape, but if you don't mind me saying, it was pretty obvious- ah- what you were about to do. And if I had wanted to stop you, it would have been only too easy.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Perhaps it would be prudent to first teach the students to block unfriendly spells, Professor.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: An excellent suggestion, Professor Snape! Ah… Let's have a volunteer pair! Um, Potter, Weasley, how about you?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Weasley's wand causes devastation with the simplest spells. We'll be sending Potter to the hospital wing in a matchbox. Might I suggest someone from my own house? Malfoy, perhaps?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Good luck, Potter.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Thank you, sir.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Wands at the ready.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Scared, Potter?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: You wish.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: On the count of three, cast your charms to disarm your opponent- only to disarm. We don't want any accidents here. One, two--

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Everte statium!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Oh!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Ha, ha, ha, ha, ha!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Rictusempra!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: I said disarm only!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Serpensortia!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Don't move, Potter. I'll get rid of it for you.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Allow me, Professor Snape. Alarte ascendare!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Sya- hassa- she. Sya- hasi- heth. Sya- hasi- heth.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Vipera evenesca.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: What are you playing at?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: You're a Parselmouth? Why didn't you tell us?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: I'm a what?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: You can talk to snakes.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: I know. I mean, I accidentally set a python on my cousin Dudley at the zoo once. Uh, once! But, so what? I bet loads of people here can do it.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: No, they can't. It's not a very common gift, Harry. This is bad.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: What's bad? If I hadn't told that snake not to attack Justin.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Oh, that's what you said to it!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: You were there! You heard me!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: I heard you speaking Parseltongue. Snake language?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: I spoke a different language? But- I didn't realize I- how can I speak a language without knowing I can?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: I don't know, Harry, but it sounded like you were egging the snake on, or something. Harry, listen to me. There's a reason the symbol of Slytherin House is a serpent. Salazar Slytherin was a Parselmouth. He could talk to snakes, too.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Exactly! Now the whole school's gonna think you're his great- greatgreat grandson, or something.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: But I'm not… I can't be.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: He lived a thousand years ago; for all we know, you could be.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: I'll see you back in the common room.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Blood…I want blood…They all must die. Kill… Kill… Kill! Time to kill.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Caught in the act! I'll have you out this time, Potter. Mark my words.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: No! Mr. Filch! Y-you- you don't understand!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Oh!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Professor… I swear I didn't!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: This is out of my hands, Potter.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Professor Dumbledore will be waiting for you. Sherbet lemon.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Professor Dumbledore?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Bee in your bonnet, Potter?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: I… I-I was- I was just wondering if you'd put me in the right house.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Yes, you were particularly difficult to place. But, I stand by what I said last year-- you would have done well in Slytherin.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: You're wrong.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Umm…

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Harry?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Professor! Sir, your bird- there was nothing I could do- he- he just caught fire!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Oh, and about time, too. He's been looking dreadful for days. Pity you had to see him on a burning day. Fawkes is a phoenix, Harry. They burst into flame when it is time for them to die, and then they are reborn from the ashes.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Ah, fascinating creatures, phoenixes. They can carry immensely heavy loads, and their- their tears have healing powers.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Professor Dumbledore, sir! Wait! Listen! Professor Dumbledore, sir, it wasn't Harry!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Hagrid.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: In fact, I'd be prepared ter swear it in front o' the Ministry of Magic!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Hagrid! Relax. I do not believe that Harry attacked anyone.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Well, of course you don't, and… Oh… Oh, right. Well, I'll, umhum. I'll just wait outside, then.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Yes.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: You don't think it was me, Professor?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: No, Harry. I do not think it was you… But I must ask you, is there something you wish to tell me?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: No, sir. Nothing.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Very well, then. Off you go.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Everything's set. We just need a bit of who you're changing into.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Crabbe and Goyle.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: We also need to make sure that the real Crabbe and Goyle can't burst in on us while we're interrogating Malfoy.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: How?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: I've got it all worked out. I filled these with a simple Sleeping Draught. Simple, but powerful. Now, once they're asleep hide them in the broomstick cupboard and pull out a few of their hairs, and put on their uniforms.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Whose hair are you ripping out then?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: I've already got mine. Millicent Bulstrode– Slytherin- I got this off her robes. I'm going to go check on the Polyjuice Potion. Make sure that Crabbe and Goyle find these.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Ahem…

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Ron, maybe I should do it?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Yeah. Right.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Wingardium leviosa. Here they come.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: It's good right? Ah… Cool!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Ummm…um.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Ummm…um.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: How thick could you get?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Come on. Let's get 'em.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: We'll have exactly one hour before we change back into ourselves… Add the hairs.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Ugh- essence of Crabbe.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Cheers!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: I think I'm gonna be sick!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Me too.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Ughh!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Uh… Harry?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Ron!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Bloody hell!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: We still sound like ourselves. You need to sound more like Crabbe.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Uh… Bloody hell.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Excellent.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: But where's Hermione?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: I- I don't think I'm going. You go on without me!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Hermione, are you okay?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Just go. You're wasting time!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Come on.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: I think the Slytherin common room's this way.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Okay.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Excuse me.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: What are you doing d- uh, I mean… What are you doing down here?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: I happen to be a school prefect. You, on the other hand, have no business wandering the corridors at this time of night. What are your names again?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Uhh…

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: I'm…

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Crabbe, Goyle! Where have you two been? Pigging out in the Great Hall all this time? Why are you wearing glasses?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Ah- um… Reading.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Reading?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Uh-huh.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: I didn't know you could read. And what are you doing down here, Weasley?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Mind your attitude, Malfoy.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Well, sit down. You'd never know the Weasleys were pure-bloods, the way they behave. They're an embarrassment to the wizarding world. All of them. What's wrong with you, Crabbe?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Ahem…Stomachache.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: You know, I'm surprised that the Daily Prophet hasn't done a report on all these attacks. I suppose Dumbledore is trying to hush it all up. Father always said Dumbledore was the worst thing that ever happened to this place.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: You're wrong!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: What? You think there's someone here who's worse than Dumbledore?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Harry Potter?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Good one, Goyle. You're absolutely right. Saint Potter. And people actually think that he's the Heir of Slytherin!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: But then you must have some idea who's behind it all.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: You know I don't Goyle. I told you yesterday. How many times do I have to tell you? Is this yours? But my father did say this: It's been fifty years since the Chamber was opened. He wouldn't tell me who opened it-- only that they were expelled. The last time the Chamber of Secrets was opened, a Mudblood died. So, it's only a matter of time before one of them is killed this time. As for me, I hope it's Granger. What's the matter with you two? You're acting very…odd.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: It's his… stomachache. Calm down.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: S- scar.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Hair!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Hey! Where are you going?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: That was close!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Hermione, come out. We've got loads to tell you!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Go away!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Ahh! Wait till you see. It's awful! He- ha, ha, he- hee!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Hermione? A- are you OK?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Aaah!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Do you remember me telling you that the Polyjuice Potion was only for human transformations? It was cat's hair I plucked off Millicent Bulstrode's robes. Look at my face.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Hee, ha, ha!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Look at your tail!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Ha, ha, ha!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Have you spoken to Hermione?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: She should be out of hospital in a few days, when she stops coughing up fur balls… What's this?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Yuck!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Looks like Moaning Myrtle's flooded the bathroom.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Oooh, oooh, ooooh, huh– huh. Come to throw something else at me?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Why would I throw something at you?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Don't ask me! Here I am, minding my own business, and someone thinks it's funny to throw a book at me.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: But, it can't hurt if someone throws something at you. I mean, it'll just go right through you.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Sure! Let's all throw books at Myrtle because she can't feel it! Ten points if you get through her stomach! Fifty points if it goes through her head!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: But, who threw it at you, anyway?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: I don't know, I didn't see them. I was just sitting in the Ubend thinking about death - aah - and it fell through the top of my head. Uhhuh. Whoo-oooh-whoooo…

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: 'Tom Marvolo Riddle.'

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: 'My name is Harry Potter.'

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Hello Harry Potter, my name is Tom Riddle.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: 'Do you know anything about the Chamber of Secrets?'

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Yes.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: 'Can you tell me?'

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: No. But I can show you. Let me take you back fifty years ago…

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Excuse me. Could you tell me what's going on here? Are you Tom Riddle?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Riddle! Come.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Professor Dumbledore.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Dumbledore?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: It is not wise to be wandering around this late hour, Tom.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Yes, Professor. I- I suppose I- I had to see for myself if the rumors were true.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: I'm afraid they are, Tom. They are true.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: About the school, as well? I don't have a home to go to. They wouldn't really close Hogwarts, would they Professor?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: I understand Tom, but I'm afraid Headmaster Dippet may have no choice.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Sir- if it all stopped- if the person responsible was caught--

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Is there something you wish to tell me?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: No, sir. Nothing.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Very well, then. Off you go.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Good night, sir.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Let's get yeh out of there.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Evening, Hagrid. I'm going to have to turn you in, Hagrid. I don't think you meant it to kill anyone, but--

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: You can't! You don't understand.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: The dead girl's parents will be here tomorrow. The least Hogwarts can do is make sure the thing that killed their daughter is slaughtered.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: It wasn't him. Aragog never killed no one! Never!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Monsters don't make good pets, Hagrid. Now, stand aside.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: No!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Stand aside, Hagrid!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: No!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Cistem aperio! Arania exumai!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Aragog! Aragog!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: I can't let you go. They'll have your wand for this, Hagrid. You'll be expelled.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Hagrid! Haagriid!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Woah!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: It was Hagrid. Hagrid opened the Chanter of Secrets fifty years ago.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: It can't be Hagrid. It just can't be.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: We don't even know this Tom Riddle. He sounds like a dirty, rotten snitch to me.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: The monster had killed somebody, Ron. What would any of us have done?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Look. Hagrid's our friend. Why don't we just go and ask him about it?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: That'll be a cheerful visit! “Hello, Hagrid! Tell us, have you been setting anything mad and hairy loose in the castle lately?”

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Mad and hairy? You wouldn't be talking about me now, would ya?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: No!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: No!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: No!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: W- what's that you've got, Hagrid?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Oh, It's a- Flesh-Eatin' Slug Repellent. For the Mandrakes, ya know. Now, accordin' to Professor Sprout, they've still got a bit o' growing up to do. But, once their acne's cleared up, we'll be able to chop 'em up and stew 'em, and then we'll get those people down at the hospital un-Petrified. In the meantime, though, you three had best be lookin' after yourselves. All right? Hmm.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Hello, Neville!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Harry- I don't know who did it, but you'd better come! Come on!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: It had to be a Gryffindor. Nobody else knows our password- unless it wasn't a student.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Who ever it was, they must have been looking for something.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: And they found it. Tom Riddle's diary is gone.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Alright, listen up. We play our game, Hufflepuff doesn't stand a

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: And not to mention, they're dead scared that Harry'll Petrify them if they fly anywhere near him.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Well, that too. Professor McGonagall.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: This match has been cancelled.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: We can't cancel Quidditch.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Silence, Wood. You and your teammates will go to Gryffindor Tower, now. Potter, you and I will find Mr. Weasley. There's something the both of you have to see.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: I warn you, this could be a wee bit of a shock.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Hermione!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: She was found near the Library, along with this. Does it mean anything to either of you?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: No.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Could I have your attention please? Because of recent events, these new rules will be put into effect immediately. “All students will return to their house common rooms by six o'clock every evening. All students will be escorted to each lesson by a teacher. No exceptions.” I should tell you this: unless the culprit behind these attacks is caught, it is likely the school will be closed.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: We've got to talk to Hagrid, Ron. I can't believe it's him, but if he did set the monster loose last time, he'll know how to get inside the Chamber of Secrets, and that's a start.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: But you heard McGonagall! We're not allowed to leave the tower except for class.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: I think it's time to get my Dad's old cloak out again.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Who's there? Hello? Hello?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: What's that for?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Oh, nothing. I- I was expecting, ah… It doesn't matter- come on inI just made a pot o' tea.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Hagrid, are you okay?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: I'm fine! I'm alright.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Did you hear about Hermione?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Oh, yeah. I heard about that, all righ'.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Look, we have to ask you something. Do you know who's opened the Chamber of Secrets?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: What you had to understand about that is—  Quick under the cloak. Don't say a word. Be quiet, both o' you… Professor Dumbledore, sir!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Good evening, Hagrid. I wonder, could we…?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Of course! Come in! Come in.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: That's Dad's boss! Cornelius Fudge, Minister of Magic!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Bad business, Hagrid. Very bad business. Had to come-- three attacks on Muggle-borns. Things have gone far enough. The Ministry's got to act.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Oh, but I never- you know I never, Professor!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: I want it understood, Cornelius, that Hagrid has my full confidence.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Albus look, Hagrid's record is against him. I've got to take him.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Take me? Take me where? Not Azkaban Prison?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: I'm afraid we have no choice, Hagrid.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Already here, Fudge? Good…

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: What're you doin' here? Get outta my house!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Believe me, I take absolutely no pleasure being inside your-- you call this a house? Huh! No. I simply called at the school, and was told the headmaster was here.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Well, what exactly is it that you want with me?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: The other governors and I have decided it's time for you to step aside. This is an order of suspension. You'll find all twelve signatures on it. I'm afraid we feel you've rather lost your touch. Well, what, with all these attacks, there'll be no Muggle-borns left at Hogwarts. I can only imagine what an awful loss that would be to the school.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Yeh can' take Professor Dumbledore away. Take him away, an' the Muggle-borns won' stand a chance! You mark my words, there'll be killin's next!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: You think so?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Calm yourself, Hagrid. If the governors desire my removal, I will, of course, step aside. However, you will find that help will always be given at Hogwarts to those who ask for it.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Admirable sentiments. Shall we? Fudge!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Come, Hagrid… Well?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Ahem! If, uh, if anybody was looking for some stuff, then all they'd have to do would be to follow the spiders. Yup! That would lead them right! That's all I have to say. Oh, and someone'll need to feed Fang while I'm away.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Good boy.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Hagrid's right! With Dumbledore gone, there'll be an attack a day!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Look! Well, come on. Come on, Fang!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: What?!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: You heard what Hagrid said; 'Follow the spiders.'

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: They're headed to the Dark Forest! Why spiders! Why couldn't it be “follow the butterflies?”

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Harry, I don't like this… Harry, I don't like this at all!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Shush!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Can we go back now?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Come on!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Who is it?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Don't panic.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Hagrid? Is that you?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: We're friends of Hagrid's. And you? Y- y-you're Aragog aren't you?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Yes. Hagrid has never sent men into our hollow before.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: He's in trouble. Up at the school, there have been attacks. They think it's Hagrid. They think he opened the Chamber of Secrets, like before.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: That's a lie! Hagrid never opened the Chamber of Secrets.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Then you're not the monster.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: No! The monster was born in the castle. I came to Hagrid from a distant land, in the pocket of a traveler.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Harry.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Shush. But if you're not the monster, then- then what did kill that girl fifty years ago?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: We do not speak of it. It is an ancient creature we spiders fear above all others.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: But have you seen it?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: I never saw any part of the castle but the box in which Hagrid kept me. The girl was discovered in a bathroom. When I was accused, Hagrid brought me here.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Harry!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: What?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Ahh- hhh…

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Well, thank you. We'll just…go.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Go? I think not. My sons and daughters do not harm Hagrid on my command. But I cannot deny them fresh meat when it wanders so willingly into our midst. Good-bye, friend of Hagrid.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Can we panic now?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Know any spells?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: One, but it's not powerful enough for all of them.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Where's Hermione when you need her?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Let's go! Arania exumai! Go!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Whoah!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Whoah!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Glad we're out of there! Ah- Aaaah!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Arania exumai!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Thanks for that.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Don't mention it. Get us out of here. Now! Come on! Come on! Move faster!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Aah!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Aah!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Go on! Go! Get us in the air.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: The flying gear's jammed!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Come on! Pull!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: I'm trying!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Follow the spiders! Follow the spiders! If Hagrid ever gets out of Azkaban, I'll kill him! I mean, what was the point of sending us in there? What have we found out?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: We know one thing. Hagrid never opened the Chamber of Secrets. He was innocent.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Wish you were here Hermione. We need you… now, more than ever.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: What's that?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Ron, this is why Hermione was in the Library the day she was attacked. Come on!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: 'Of the many fearsome beasts that roam our land, none is more deadly than the basilisk. Capable of living for hundreds of years, instant death awaits any who meet this giant serpent's eye. Spiders flee before it.' Ron, this is it. The monster in the Chamber of Secrets is a basilisk. That's why I can hear it speak. It's a snake!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: But if it kills by looking people in the eye, why is it no one's dead?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Because no one did look it in the eye. Not directly, at least. Colin saw it through his camera. Justin…Justin must have seen the basilisk through Nearly Headless Nick. Nick got the full blast of it- but he's a ghost- he couldn't die again. And Hermione…had the mirror. I bet you anything she was using it to look around corners, in case it came along.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: And Mrs. Norris? I'm pretty sure she didn't have a camera or a mirror, Harry.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: The water. There was water on the floor that night. She only saw the basilisk's reflection. 'Spiders flee before it.' It all fits!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: But how's a basilisk been getting around? A dirty great snake- someone would have seen it.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Hermione's answered that, too.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Pipes? It's using the plumbing!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Remember what Aragog said, about that girl fifty years ago? She died in a bathroom? What if she never left?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Moaning Myrtle.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: All students are to return to their house dormitories at once. All teachers to the second floor corridor, immediately.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: As you can see, the Heir of Slytherin has left another message. Our worst fear has been realized. A student has been taken by the monster into the Chamber itself. The students must be sent home. I'm afraid this is the end of Hogwarts.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: So sorry- dozed off- what have I missed?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: A girl has been snatched by the monster, Lockhart. Your moment has come, at last.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: My m-moment?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Weren't you saying just last night that you've known all along where the entrance to the Chamber of Secrets is?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Well, that's settled. We'll leave you to deal with the monster, Gilderoy. Your skills, after all, are a legend.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Very well- ah- I'll just be in my office getting, umgetting ready.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Who is it that the monster's taken, Minerva?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Ginny Weasley.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: 'Her skeleton will lie in the chamber forever.' Ginny…

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Lockhart may be useless, but he's going to try and get into the Chamber. At least we can tell him what we know.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Professor, we have some information for you! Are you going somewhere?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Uh, ah- well, yes- um, urgent call- unavoidable- got to go.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: What about my sister?!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Well, um- as to that, most unfortunate. No one regrets more than I.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: You're the Defense Against the Dark Arts teacher! You can't go now!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Well- I must say- when I took the job there was nothing in the job description about a…

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: You're running away? After all that stuff you did in your books?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Books can be misleading!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: You wrote them!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: My dear boy, do use your common sense! My books wouldn't have sold half as well if people didn't think I'd done all those things!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: You're a fraud! You've just been taking credit for what other wizards have done!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Is there anything you can do?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Yes, now you mention it. I'm rather gifted with Memory Charms. Otherwise, you see, all those wizards would have gone blabbing. And I'd never have sold another book. In fact, ah…I'm ah…going to have to do the same to you.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Don't even think about it.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Oh! Who's there? Oh! Hello, Harry! Ron. What do you want?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: To ask you how you died.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Oh! It was dreadful. It happened right here in this very cubicle. I'd hidden because Olive Hornby was teasing me about my glasses. I was crying, and then I heard somebody come in.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Who was it Myrtle?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: I don't know. I was Distraught! Huhh-huh…But they said something funny, a kind of made up language. And I realized it was a boy speaking, so I unlocked the door to tell him to go away and… I died.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Just like that? How?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: I just remember seeing a pair of great big yellow eyes…over there, by that sink. Ohhhhooo…

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: This is it. This is it, Ron. I think this is the entrance to the Chamber of Secrets.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Say something. Harry, say something in Parseltongue!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Hesha- Hassah.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Excellent, Harry. Haa! Good work! Well then, I'll just be, ah… There's no need for me to stay.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Oh, yes there is! You first.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Now, boys what good will it do?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Better you than us.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Um…but…obviously, yes. Sure you don't want to test it first? No! Aaaah! It's really quite filthy down here.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: All right. Let's go.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Oh, Harry? If you die down there, you're welcome to share my toilet. Hee, hee.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Uh…thanks Myrtle.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Aaah!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Aaah!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Ugh!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Now remember, any sign of movement, close your eyes straightaway.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Go on.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: This way.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: What's this?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: It looks like a… snake.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: It's a snakeskin.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Bloody hell. Whatever shed this must be sixty feet long-- or more! Heart of a lion, this one.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: The adventure ends here, boys. But don't fret. The world will know our story. How I was too late to save the girl. How you two tragically lost your minds at the sight of her mangled body. So, you first, Mr. Potter. Say good-bye to your memories. Obliviate!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Harry! Harry!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Ron! Ron, are you ok?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: I'm fine!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Uhh… Hello. Who are you?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Um…Ron Weasley.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Really? And uh, who- who am I?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Lockhart's memory charm backfired. He hasn't got a clue who he is!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: It's an odd sort of place this, isn't it? Do you live here?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: No!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Really? Well?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: What'll do I do now?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: You wait here and try and shift some of this rock so we can get back through. I'll go on and find Ginny!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: OK.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Hesha- Hassah.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Ginny… Ginny! Oh, Ginny, please don't be dead. Wake up. Wake up! Please, wake up!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: She won't wake.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Tom. Tom Riddle! What do you mean, 'she won't wake?' She's not…?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: She's still alive, but only just.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Are you a ghost?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: A memory, preserved in a diary for fifty years.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: She's cold as ice. Ginny, please don't be dead. Wake up! You've got to help me, Tom. There's a basilisk.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: It won't come until it's called.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Give me my wand, Tom.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: You won't be needing it.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Listen, we've got to go! We've got to save her!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: I'm afraid I can't do that, Harry. You see, as poor Ginny grows weaker, I grow stronger. Yes Harry, it was Ginny Weasley who opened the Chamber of Secrets.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: No. She couldn't. She wouldn't!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: It was Ginny who set the basilisk on the Mudbloods and Filch's cat, Ginny who wrote the threatening messages on the walls.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: But why?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Because I told her to. You'll find that I can be very persuasive. Not that she knew what she was doing. She was, shall we say, in a kind of trance. Still, the power of the diary began to scare her. And she tried to dispose of it in the girl's bathroom. And then, who should find it, but you? The very person I was most anxious to meet.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: But, why did you want to meet me?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: I knew I had to talk to you, meet you if I could. So I decided to show you my capture of that brainless oaf, Hagrid, to gain your trust.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Hagrid's my friend! And you framed him, didn't you?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: It was my word against Hagrid's. Only Dumbledore seemed to think he was innocent.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: I'll bet Dumbledore saw right through you.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: He certainly kept an annoyingly close watch on me after that. I knew it wouldn't be safe to open the Chamber again while I was still at school, so I decided to leave behind a diary preserving my sixteen-year-old self in its pages, so that one day I would be able to lead another to finish Salazar Slytherin's noble work.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Well, you haven't finished it this time. In a few hours, the Mandrake Draught will be ready, and everyone who was Petrified will be all right again.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Haven't I told you? Killing Mudbloods doesn't matter to me anymore. For many months now, my new target… has been you. How is it that a baby, with no extraordinary magical talent, was able to defeat the greatest wizard of all time? How did you escape with nothing but a scar, while Lord Voldemort's powers were destroyed?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Why do you care how I escaped? Voldemort was after your time.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Voldemort is my past, present, and future.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: You! You're the Heir of Slytherin. You're Voldemort.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Surely, you didn't think I was going to keep my filthy Muggle father's name? No. I fashioned myself a new name, a name I knew wizards everywhere would one day fear to speak, when I became the greatest sorcerer in the world.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Albus Dumbledore is the greatest sorcerer in the world!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Dumbledore's been driven out of this castle by the mere memory of me!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: He'll never be gone! Not as long as those who remain are loyal to him! Fawkes?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: So, this is what Dumbledore sends his great defender, a songbird and an old hat. Shearhas- Samnathas- Sélithaeine.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Let's match the power of Lord Voldemort, Heir of Salazar Slytherin, against the famous Harry Potter. Sethae- He- This. Parseltongue won't save you now, Potter. It only obeys me!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: No! Your bird may have blinded the basilisk, but it can still hear you!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Yes, Potter, the process is nearly complete. In a few minutes Ginny will be dead, and I will cease to be a memory. Lord Voldemort will return- very… much… alive!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Ginny-

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Remarkable isn't it, how quickly the venom of the basilisk penetrates the body? I'd guess you have little more than a minute to live. You'll be with your dear Mudblood mother soon, Harry. Funny, the damage a silly little book can do… especially in the hands of a silly, little girl. What are you doing? Stop! No! Ahhhh! Ahhhh! Ahhhh!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Ginny…

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Harry. It was me- but I swear, I didn't mean to! Riddle made me, and… Harry, you're hurt!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Don't worry. Ginny, you need to get yourself out. Follow the Chamber, and you'll find Ron. You were brilliant, Fawkes. I just wasn't quick enough… Of course! Phoenix tears have healing powers. Thanks! It's alright, Ginny. It's over. It's just a memory.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Amazing! This is just like magic!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: You both realize, of course, that in the past few hours you have broken perhaps a dozen school rules?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Yes, sir.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Yes, sir.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: And there is sufficient evidence to have you both expelled.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Yes, sir.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Yes, sir.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Therefore, it is only fitting, that you both receive Special Awards for Services to the School.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Thanks, sir!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: And now, Mr. Weasley, if you would, have an owl deliver these release papers to Azkaban? I believe we- we want our gamekeeper back. Harry… first, I want to thank you, Harry. You must have shown me real loyalty down in the Chamber. Nothing but that could have called Fawkes to you. And, um… second, I sense that something is troubling you. Am I right, Harry?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: It's just… You see, sir I- I couldn't help but notice certain things, certain- certain similarities, between Tom Riddle and me.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: I see. Well, you can speak Parseltongue, Harry. Why? Because Lord Voldemort can speak Parseltongue. If I'm not mistaken, Harry, he transferred some of his powers to you the night he gave you that scar.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter.text: Voldemort transferred some of his powers… to me?
