Harry Potter.text: Isn't it?  That's life, I suppose. One goes along and then... poof.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: That's never unicorn hair, Hagrid?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Hagrid looks up, reels a bit.  Nods.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: But my dear chap, do you know how much that's worth?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: No idea... no idea at all...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: It was a student who gave me Francis.  One spring afternoon I discovered a bowl upon my desk with a few inches of clear water. There was a flower petal floating upon the surface.  As I watched, the petal sank, but just before it touched bottom... it transformed. Into a wee fish.  It was beautiful magic, wondrous to behold.  The petal had come from a lily.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Your mother.  The day I came downstairs, the day I found the bowl empty... was the day she...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: I know what you want.  But I can't give it to you.  It will ruin me...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Do you know why I survived?  The night I got this.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Because of her.  Because she sacrificed herself.  Because she refused to step aside.  Because her love was more powerful than Voldemort.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Please don't say his --

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: I'm not afraid of the name, Professor.  And I'm not afraid of him.  And you shouldn't be either. She didn't just die for me that night.  She died for you too.  She died for everyone who's ever woken in the middle of the night afraid a Death Eater waited on their doorstep.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Professor.  I'm going to tell you something, something others have only guessed at.  It's true.  I am the Chosen One.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Only I can kill him.  But in order to do so, I need to know what Tom Riddle asked you that night in your office all those years ago. And I need to know what you told him.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Be brave, Professor.  Be brave like my mother.  Otherwise you disgrace her.  Otherwise she died for nothing.  Otherwise, the bowl remains empty forever.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Don't think too badly of me once you've seen it.  You don't know what he was like... even then.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: How is he?  Horace?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Sir, is it true that Professor Merrythought is retiring?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Now, Tom, I couldn't tell you if I knew, could I?  I must say, m'boy, I'd like to know where you get your information.  More knowledgable than half the staff, you are. By the way, thank you for the pineapple -- you're quite right, it is my favorite -- how is it you knew?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Intuition.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Good gracious, is it that time already?  Off you go, boys, or Professor Dippett will have us all in detention.  Lestrange, Avery, don't forget your essays...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Look sharp, Tom.  You don't want to be caught out of bed after hours...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: I know a secret shortcut or two.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Yes, I imagine you do.  Something on your mind, Tom?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Yes, sir.  I couldn't think of anyone else to go to.  The other Professors, well, they're not like you.  They might... misunderstand.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Go on.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: I was in the library the other night, in the Restricted section, and I read something rather odd, about a bit of rare magic and I thought perhaps you could illuminate me.  It's called, as I understand it... a Horcrux.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Excuse me?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Horcrux.  I came across the term while reading and I didn't fully understand it.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: I'm not sure what you were reading, Tom, but that's very Dark stuff, very Dark indeed.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Yes, sir.  Which is why I came to you.  I mean no disrespect to the rest of the staff, but I thought if anyone could tell me... it would be you.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: A Horcrux is an object in which a person has concealed part of their soul.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Yes, I thought it might be something like that.  But I don't understand how that works, sir.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: One splits one's soul and hides part of it in an object.  By doing so, you are protected should you be attacked and your body destroyed.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Protected?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: That part of your soul that was hidden, lives on.  In other words, you cannot die.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: How does one split his soul, sir?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: I think you can guess the answer to that, Tom.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Murder.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Yes.  Killing rips the soul apart. It is a violation against nature. After, one is never the same.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Out of curiosity, sir -- can you only split your soul once?  For instance, isn't seven the most powerfully magical number --

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Seven!  Merlin's beard, Tom! Isn't it bad enough to think of killing one person?  To rip the soul into seven pieces...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: This is all hypothetical, isn't it, Tom?  All academic...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Of course, sir.  And I promise I'll not speak of our conversation.  It'll be our little secret...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Sir --

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: This is beyond anything I imagined.  In my life I have seen things that are unimaginably horrific.  I know now... you will see worse.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Do you mean to say he succeeded, sir?  In making a Horcrux?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Oh he succeeded.  And not just once.  Think, Harry.  He's just told us.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Seven.  He made seven -- the most powerfully magical number.  But... what are they exactly?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: They can be anything.  The most commonplace of objects.  A ring, for example.  Or a book...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Tom Riddle's diary --

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: It's a Horcrux, yes.  Four years ago, when you saved Ginny Weasley's life in the Chamber of Secrets, when you brought me this I knew.  This was a different kind of magic.  Very dark.  Very powerful.  But until tonight, I had no idea just how powerful...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: And the ring...?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Belonged to Voldemort's mother. It was difficult to find and...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: ... even more difficult to destroy. But if you could find them all. If you did destroy each Horcrux...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: One destroys Voldemort.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: But how would you find them?  They could be hidden anywhere, couldn't they...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: True.  But magic, especially Dark magic...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: ... leaves traces.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: It's where you've been going, isn't it, sir?  When you leave the school.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Yes.  And I think... perhaps... I may have found another.  But this time I cannot hope to destroy it alone.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Once again, I shall ask too much of you.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Harry.  It's time.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Hermione, is the Room of Requirement unplottable?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: If one wants it to be.  Why?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: It would explain why I thought Malfoy was leaving the castle when he disappeared off the Map.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: He was going to the Room of Requirement.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Of course, and that explains the Vanishing Cabinet as well!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: No.  I got an owl from Dad this morning.  The one at Borgin & Burke's?  It's still there.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: But I'm telling you.  I saw it --

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: What if there are two?  Vanishing cabinets.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: What if there are?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: I don't know...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Good luck, mate.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: I don't need luck.  I'll be with Dumbledore.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Have you ever considered that you ask too much?  That you take too much for granted?  Has it ever crossed your brilliant mind that I don't want to do this anymore?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Whether it has or hasn't is irrelevant.  I will not negotiate this with you, Severus.  You agreed.  There's nothing more to discuss.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Harry.  You need a shave, my friend.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: At times I forget how much you've grown.  At times I still see the small boy from the cupboard. Forgive my mawkishness, Harry.  I am an old man.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: You look the same to me, sir.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Like your mother, you are unfailingly kind.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: A trait people never fail to undervalue.  I'm afraid.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: The place to which we journey tonight is exceedingly dangerous, Harry.  I promised that you could accompany me and I stand by that promise.  But there is a condition:  You must obey any command I give you -- without question.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Yes, sir.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Understand what I'm saying. Should I tell you to hide, you must hide.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Should I tell you to run, you will run.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: And should I tell you to abandon me and save yourself...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: You will do so.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Your word, Harry.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: My word.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Take my arm.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Sir, I thought one couldn't Apparate within Hogwarts.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Being me has its privileges.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: It's there, isn't it?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: This is the place.  Oh yes, this place has known magic. Where you stand, Harry, Tom Riddle once stood many, many years ago, when he was but a poor orphan boy with a penchant for cruelty...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: One wintry afternoon, he lured two younger classmates to this cave. What happened is unclear.  But this much is known:  the children were damaged.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Sir!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: In order to gain passage, payment must be made, payment intended to weaken any intruder.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: You should've let me, sir.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Oh, no, Harry.  Your blood is much more precious than mine.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Careful.  The water.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: It's there.  The only question is how do we get to it?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: We couldn't, perhaps, just try a Summoning Charm, sir?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Accio Horcrux!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Perhaps not.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: If you would, Harry...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Sir... have you ever taken Felix Felicis?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Only recreationally.  You see, I believe one creates one's own luck.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Professor... there are bodies in this lake.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Yes.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Remember... the water.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Do you think the Horcrux is in there, sir?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Oh yes.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: It has to be drunk.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: You remember the condition on which I brought you with me? This potion might paralyze me.  It might cause me to forget why I'm here.  It might create so much pain I beg for relief.  You are not to indulge these requests, Harry.  It is your job to make sure I keep drinking this potion even if you have to force it down my throat.  Understood?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Why can't I drink it, sir?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Because I am much older, much cleverer... and much less valuable. Your good health, Harry.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Professor?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Professor?  Can you hear me?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Don't... don't make me...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: You... you can't stop, Professor. You've got to keep drinking.  Like you said.  Remember.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Nooooooo!!!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Make it stop... Please... make it stop...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: It will, sir.  It'll stop.  But only if you drink...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: My fault.  It's all my fault...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Too much... I can't... take it... I want... to die... kill... kill me... KILL ME, HARRY!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: What?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Your word, Harry!  Your word!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: No...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Kill me!  It's the only way!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: One more.  Just one more.  And then -- I promise... I'll do what you say.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: I promise.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Water. Water...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Aguamenti.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: You did it, sir.  Look --

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Water!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: I'm trying, sir.  I'm --

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Go...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: We have to... go.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Don't worry, sir.  We're nearly there.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: I am not worried, Harry.  I am with you.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: To your Houses.  No dawdling.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: We need to get you up to the hospital, sir, to Madam Pomfrey --

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: No.  Severus... Severus is who I need... Go and wake him... Tell him what has happened...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Speak to no one else... I... I shall wait here...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: All right.  Okay.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Sir, are you... praying?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: No, Harry.  I do not pray.  I was merely closing a window -- the one that had allowed us to Apparate.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Hide yourself below.  And do not speak or show yourself without my permission.  No matter what.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Do as I say, Harry.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Trust me.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Good evening, Draco.  What brings you out on such a fine Spring evening?  Or is it Summer?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Who else is here?  I heard you talking.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: I often talk aloud to myself.  I find it extraordinarily useful. That which sounds sane at a whisper can seem utterly mad when said for all the world to hear. Haven't been whispering to yourself, have you, Draco?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: You are not an assassin, Draco.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: How do you know what I am?  I've done things that would shock you.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Like cursing Katie Bell and hoping she would, in turn, bear a cursed necklace to me?  Like replacing a bottle of mead with one laced with poison.  Forgive me, Draco, but these are attempts so feeble I cannot help but question if your heart has been really in them. I'm curious.  When Voldemort gave you this task, when he asked you to kill me, was it in a whisper?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: He trusts me!  I was chosen!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Then I shall make it easy for you.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Expelliarumus!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Well done, Draco.  But I warn you. Killing is not nearly as easy.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: You're not alone.  Are you.  There are others.  How?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: The Vanishing Cabinet in the Room of Requirement.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: That cabinet has been broken for years.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: I've been mending it.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Ingenious.  Let me guess.  It has a sister.  A twin.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: In Borgin & Burkes.  They form --

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: A passage, yes.  Very good. I once knew a boy years ago who made all the wrong choices.  Let me help you, Draco.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: I don't want your help!  Don't you see!  I have to do it!  I have to! I've got to kill you or he'll kill me.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Say that again, Draco.  But aloud this time.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Well now, look what we have here. Dumbledore.  Wandless and alone.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Cornered in his own castle.  Well done, Draco.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Good evening, Bellatrix.  I think introductions are in order.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Love to, Albus.  But I'm afraid we're on a bit of a tight schedule.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Do it.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: He doesn't have the stomach.  Like his father.  Let me finish him. In my own way.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: No!  The Dark Lord was clear.  The boy's to do it.  Go on, Draco. Now!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: No.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Severus...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Well, look who's here.  Hogwarts own Defense Against the Dark Arts teacher.  Come to see the slaughter?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Severus... please.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: I gave my word.  I made a vow...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Avada Kedavra!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: You can no longer stay here.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Boo.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Draco!  Draco! They'll kill you if you stay.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Go on!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Go on!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Cruciatus!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Incacerata!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Impedimenta!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Fight!  Fight back, you coward!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Don't ever associate that word and my name again.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: No!  He belongs to the Dark Lord!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Sectumsempra!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: You dare use my own spells against me, Potter?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: You may have gotten your mother's eyes, but you're as dim as your father.  Yes.  It's me.  I'm the Half-Blood Prince.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Hagrid... HAGRID!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Hagrid!  You alright?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Take more'n tha' ter finish me off.  Not sure about me 'ouse, tho'.  But if anybody can put it righ', Dumbledore can.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Hagrid, Dumbledore --

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Only thing I can't reckon is wha' Snape was doin' with tha' lot.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: An' wha's this wi' the Dark Mar'? Who's been killed? Where's Dumbledore, 'arry? Where's Dumbledore!!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Potter.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Potter, in light of what's happened... should you feel the need to talk to someone...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: You should know... Professor Dumbledore...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: You meant a great deal to him.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Dumbledore.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Do you think he would've done it. Draco?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: No.  He was lowering his wand.  In the end, it was Snape.  It was always Snape.  And I did nothing...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Strange.  Thinking this is a piece of Voldemort's soul...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Yeah, strange.  Only... it's not. It's a fake.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Go on.  Open it.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: 'To the Dark Lord.  I know I will be dead long before you read this but I want you to know that it was I who discovered your secret.  I have stolen the real Horcrux and intend to destroy it as soon as I can.  I face death in the hope that when you meet your match, you will be mortal once more.  R.A.B.'

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Dunno.  But whoever they are, they have the real Horcrux.  Which means, it was a waste.  All of it.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Ron's okay with it, you know.  You and Ginny.  But if I were you, when he's around, I'd keep the snogging to a minimum.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: I'm not coming back, Hermione.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: We reckoned -- Ron and me.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: I have to finish what Dumbledore started. I'm not sure where that will lead me... but I'll let you and Ron konw where I am -- when I can.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: I've always admired your courage, Harry, but sometimes... you're really thick.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: You don't honestly think you can find all those Horcruxes by yourself, do you? You need us, Harry.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Yeah.  I do.  But do me a favor. When I'm around?  Keep the snogging to a minimum.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Like that's going to happen.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Besides, he's barking.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Funny, he says the same about you.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Yes, but I'm exceptionally perceptive.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: You're brilliant.  You both are.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: Do you think we'll ever... come back?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter.text: I don’t know. I never realised how beautiful this place was.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: These are dark times, there is no denying.  Our world has perhaps faced no greater threat than it does today.  But I say this to our citizenry:  we, ever your servants, continue to defend your liberty and repel the forces that would seek to take it from you. Your Ministry remains strong...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Hermione.  Your tea is ready, dear.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Coming, Mum.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Don't you look lovely.  All packed?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Are you sure these biscuits are sugar-free?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Quite sure, dear.  See the big bold letters that say 'Sugar Free'?  Dead giveaway.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Mm.  Yes. Hello, kitten.  Don't you look lovely.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Darling, don't be suspicious the biscuits taste so good, be grateful the company's so clever...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Obliviate.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Goodbye.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: What are those?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Close the door.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: These are for the Order.  So many are on the run now, it helps them to stay connected with the rest of us.  Know they're not alone...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: C'mon.  Mum's got dinner ready.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Severus.  I was beginning to worry you'd lost your way.  Come.  I've saved you a seat.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: You know our hosts, of course, Severus.  Narcissa in particular has been most hospitable.  Lucius, on the other hand, is, I fear, burdened by my presence.  Are you, Lucius?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: My lord?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Are you burdened?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: My lord is always welcome here.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: You bring news I trust, Severus?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: It will happen Saturday next.  At nightfall.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: And this information comes --

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: -- from the source we discussed.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: I have heard differently, my lord. Dawlish, the Auror, let slip that the Potter boy will not be moved until the thirtieth of this month, the night before he turns seventeen.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: This is a false trail.  The Auror Office no longer plays any part in the protection of Harry Potter. Those closest to him believe we have infiltrated the Ministry.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Well, they've got that right, then, 'aven't they?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Pius, what say you?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: One hears many things, my lord. Whether the truth is among them is not clear.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Spoken like a true politician. You will, I think, prove most useful, Pius.  Where will he be taken?  The boy?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: To a safehouse.  Likely the home of someone in the Order.  I'm told it has been given every manner of protection possible. Once there, it will be impractical to attack him.  We may have compromised the Ministry, but there are those who remain loyal to him.  As long as the Ministry stands, his allies within will have the means at their disposal to insure his safety.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: My lord, if I might, I'd like to volunteer myself for this task. I'd like to kill the boy.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Wormtail!  Have I not spoken to you about keeping our guest quiet?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Yes, m-my lord.  Right away, my lord.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: As inspiring as I find your bloodlust, Bellatrix, I must be the one to kill Harry Potter.  But I face an unfortunate complication.  It has recently come to my attention that my wand and Potter's share the same core. They are, in some ways, twins.  We can wound but not fatally harm one another.  Which means, if I am to kill him... I will have to do it with another's wand.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Come now.  Surely one of you would like the honor?  What about... you, Lucius?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: I require your wand.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Do I detect elm?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Yes, my lord.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: And the core?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Dragon -- dragon heartstring.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: My wand?  You can't possibly think I would give you my wand.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: No, my lord.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: For those of you who do not know, we are joined tonight by Miss Charity Burbage who until recently taught at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.  Her specialty was Muggle studies. It is Miss Burbage's belief that Muggles are not so different from us.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: She would, given her way, have us mate with them.  To her, the mixture of magical and Muggle blood is not an abomination but something to be encouraged.  I, of course, take a contrary view.  But we're all civilized here.  All adults.  We can agree to disagree.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Severus, please.  We're friends...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Avada Kedavra!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Nagini... Dinner.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Come now, Dudley.  Hurry up!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Time for the teary farewell.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: I've lived in this house twenty years.  And now -- in a single night -- I'm expected to leave.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: They'll torture you.  Even Dudley. If they think you know where I'm going, they'll stop at noth--

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: You think I don't know that?  You think I don't know what they're capable of?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: You didn't just lose a mother that night in Godric's Hollow, you know.  I lost a sister.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Do you have any?  Magic?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: What a cruel thing to ask.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Well, this is goodbye then, boy.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: I don't understand.  Isn't he coming with us?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Who?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Harry.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Absolutely not.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Why?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Well, because -- he doesn't want to, do you, boy?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Absolutely not.  Besides, I'm just a waste of space.  Isn't that right, Vernon?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Come on, Dudley, we're off.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: I don't think you're a waste of space.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Well... thanks.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: See you, Big D.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Good riddance.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: All righ', 'arry?  Yeh look fit.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Yeah, he's ruddy gorgeous.  What say we get undercover before someone murders him.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: I thought you were looking after the Prime Minister, Kingsley.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: You're more important.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Hello, Harry.  Bill Weasley.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Wasn't always this handsome.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Dead ugly.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: True enough.  Owe it all to a werewolf by name of Greyback. Hope to repay the favor one day.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: You are still beautiful to me, William.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Just remember, Fleur, once you're married:  Bill takes his steaks on the raw side now.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: My husband, the joker.  By the way, wait until you hear the news! Remus and I are --

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: All right, all right!  You'll all have time for a cozy catch-up later!  We've got to get the hell out of here and soon!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Potter, you're underage, which means you've still got the Trace on you.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: The Trace?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: You sneeze and the Ministry will know who wipes your nose.  Point is, we have to use those means of transport the Trace can't detect: brooms, thestrals and the like. We'll go in pairs.  That way if anyone's out there waiting for us -- and I reckon there will be -- they won't know which Harry Potter is the real one.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: The real one...?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: I believe you're familiar with this particular brew.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: No!  Absolutely not!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: I told you he'd take it well.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: If you think I'm going to let people risk their lives for me --

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Never done that before, have we?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: This is different.  Taking that. Becoming me -- no.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Well, none of us really fancy it, mate.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Yeah, imagine if something went wrong and we were stuck as scrawny, specky gits forever.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Everyone here's of age, Potter, and they've all agreed to take the risk.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Technically, I've been coerced. Mundungus Fletcher, Mr. Potter. I've always been a huge admirer.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Nip it, Mundungus!  All right, Granger, as discussed.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Blimey, Hermione!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Straight in here, if you please.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: For those of you who haven't taken Polyjuice Potion before, fair warning.  It tastes like goblin piss.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Have a lot of experience with that, do you, Mad-Eye?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Just trying to defuse the tension.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Wow -- we're identical!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Wow -- we're identical!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Not yet you aren't.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Don't have something a bit more sporty, do you?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Yes, don't fancy this color at all.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Fancy this:  You're not you, so shut it and strip. You'll need to change too, Potter.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Bill, look away -- I'm 'ideous.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: I knew Ginny was lying about that tattoo.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Harry, your eyesight really is awful.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Blimey.  I almost forgot.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Right then.  We'll be pairing off. Each Potter will have a protector. As for you, Harry...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Yes?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: The real Harry!  Where the devil are you, anyway?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Here.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: You'll ride with Hagrid.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Brought yeh here sixteen years ago when you were barely bigger than a Bowtruckle. Seems only righ' I should be the one ter take yeh away.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Yeah, it's all very touching. Let's go.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Good luck, everyone.  On the count of three.  One... two --

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Hagrid!  We've got to help the others!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Can't do it, 'arry.  My job's ter get you where we're goin' safe 'n sound -- Mad-Eye's orders!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: What was that?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Dragon fire!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: That's him!  The real one!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Hol' tight, 'arry!  We've got ter get yeh out of here!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Hagrid... HAGRID...!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Avada...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Harry!  Hagrid!  What happened?! Have you seen the others?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Is no one back yet?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: They were on us from the star', Molly -- the Death Eaters.  And You-Know-Who as well.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Well, thank goodness you two are all right.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Haven't go' any brandy, have yeh, Molly?  Fer medicinal purposes?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Ron and Tonks should've already been back.  Dad and Fred as well.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Oh my God!  George!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: The house!  Quickly!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: My boy!  My darling boy!  What've they done to you?!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Remus!  What're you doing!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: What creature sat in the corner the first time that Harry Potter visited my office at Hogwarts!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Are you mad...?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: What Creature!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: A grindylow!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: We've been betrayed.  Voldemort knew you were being moved tonight. I had to make sure you weren't an imposter.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Who did this to him?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Snape. He'll be fine, Molly.  But that's Dark Magic.  The damage is done.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Someone else is back.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: The last words Albus Dumbledore spoke to the pair of us?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: 'Harry is the best hope we have. Trust him.'

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: What gave you away?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Hedwig -- I think.  She was trying to protect me --

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Hey ya -- Well... thanks.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Deserves that.  Brilliant, he was. Wouldn't be standing here without him.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Really?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Always the tone of surprise.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Are we the last?  Where's George?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Remus.  Where's my son?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: How do you feel, Georgie?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Saint-like.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Come again?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Saint-like... You see, I'm holy. Holey, Fred, geddit?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: With the whole wide world of ear- related humor at your disposal, you go for holey?  Pathetic.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Reckon I'm still better-looking than you.  Better-looking than Bill, that's for sure.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Mad-Eye's dead.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Mundungus took one look at Voldemort and Disapparated.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Mad-Eye reckoned You-Know-Who would expect the real Harry to be with the most skilled Auror.  He knew he'd be in the most danger.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: It doesn't explain how they knew we were moving Harry tonight.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Wha'?  One of us?  Tha's mad.  I'd wager me life it wasn' none of you lot.  An' if it was me I'd kno', wouldn' I?  Talk in me sleep on occasion, I'll admit, but there's only Fang aroun' ter hear an' mostly it's gibberish an' besides I'd cut me tongue out 'fore 'd betray 'arry e'en in me dreams --

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Wha's so funny!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: I trust you with my life, Hagrid. I trust everyone in this room. Understood?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: 'Ear, 'ear.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Better.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: No!  No!  I believed a different wand would work, I swear!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Then explain this!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: But it makes no sense...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Perhaps our friend's loyalties lie elsewhere, Wormtail.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: No!  There must be a way!  I'll think of something else!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: I hope so, Ollivander, for your sake.  I won't be so forgiving next time...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Going somewhere?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: No one else is going to die.  Not for me.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: For you?  You think Madeye died for you?  You think George took that curse for you?  You may be the Chosen One, mate, but this is a whole lot bigger than that.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Come with me.  Now.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: And leave Hermione?  Are you mad? We wouldn't last two days without her.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Don't tell her I said that. Besides, you've still got the Trace on you.  And there's the wedding...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Wedding?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Bill and Fleur.  Mum's been planning it for months.  Only thing that's kept her sane, I reckon.  She'll kill me if I miss it.  Kill you too.  Rather go face to face with You-Know-Who if I'm honest.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: I don't care about a bloody wedding -- no matter whose it is. I have to start searching for the Horcruxes.  It's the only chance we have to beat him.  And the longer we wait the stronger he gets.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Tonight's not the night, mate. You'd only be doing him a favor.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Do you think he knows?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: I mean, they're bits of his soul, the Horcruxes.  Bits of him.  When Dumbledore destroyed the ring and you destroyed Tom Riddle's diary all those years ago -- he must've felt something right?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: What I'm saying is, if we do this thing right, if we find the Horcruxes and begin to destroy them one by one...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Won't he know he's being hunted?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: All together now!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: One.  Two.  Three!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Were you going to tell me?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Yes.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: And Ron and Hermione.  They'll not be going back to Hogwarts either?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: I see.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Dumbledore didn't want anyone to know what it is we're doing.  If I tell you, I'd be betraying him.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Zip me up, will you.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Seems silly, doesn't it?  A wedding.  Given everything that's going on.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Maybe that's the best reason to have it.  Because of everything that's going on.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Morning.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: How's it look on your end, boys?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Brilliant!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Bloody hell, what's the Minister of Magic doing here?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Dunno.  But something tells me he didn't come to give away the bride.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: To what do we owe the pleasure, Minister?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: I think we both know the answer to that question, Mr. Potter.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: And this would be...?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Don't be coy, Mr. Potter.  Mr. Weasley.  Would you say you were close to your former Headmaster?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Dumbledore?  And me?  I dunno. I reckon I was just another Weasley to him.  He was always polite --

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: And you, Miss Granger?  How would you characterize your relationship?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: We were friendly, not close like Harry, but --

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: What's this all about?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: This.  Despite the fact that neither of your friends appear to have been particularly close to their recently deceased Headmaster, he saw fit to remember them in his will.  Now why do you suppose that would be?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: No idea.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Come now, you don't expect me to believe...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: 'Herein is set forth the Last Will and Testament of Albus Percival Wulfric Brian Dumbledore.  First, to Ronald Bilius Weasley, I leave my Deluminator, a device of my own making, in the hope that -- when things seem most dark -- it will show him the light.'

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Dumbledore left this?  For me? Brilliant.  Er -- what is it?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Wicked.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: 'To Miss Hermione Jean Granger, I leave my copy of The Tales of Beedle the Bard, in the hope that she will find it entertaining and instructive.'

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Mum used to read me those!  The Wizard and the Hopping Pot, Babbitty Rabbity and her Cackling Stump...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Oh, c'mon!  Beedle's stories are famous!  Babbity Rabbitty? No...?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: 'To Harry James Potter, I leave the Snitch he caught in his first Quidditch match at Hogwarts, as a reminder of the rewards of perseverance and skill.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: That's it then?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Not quite.  Dumbledore left you a second bequest:  The Sword of Godric Gryffindor.  Unfortunately, the Sword of Gryffindor was not Dumbledore's to give away.  As an important historical artifact, it belongs...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: To Harry!  It belongs to Harry! It chose him!  It came to him in the Chamber of Secrets when he most needed it!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: The sword may present itself to any worthy Gryffindor, Miss Granger.  That does not make it that wizard's property.  And in any event the current whereabouts of the sword are unknown.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Excuse me?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: The sword is missing. I won't pretend to be your friend, Mr. Potter.  But I assure you I'm not your enemy.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: You'll forgive me, Minister.  But it's a little hard to tell the difference these days.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Dumbledore said something very similar the last time we spoke.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Where is your guard, sir?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: I came alone.  I don't really need them anymore...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: We want you to be the godfather.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: You mean -- But that's brilliant -- I... don't know what to say.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Say yes.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Hello, Harry!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Oh, I've interrupted a deep thought, haven't I?  I can see it growing smaller in your eyes.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: No, 'course not.  How are you, Luna?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Very well.  I was bitten by a garden gnome only moments ago.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Gnome saliva is enormously beneficial!  Xenophilius Lovegood. We live just over the hill!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Nice to meet you, sir.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: I trust you know, Mr. Potter, that we at The Quibbler, unlike those toadies at the Daily Prophet, fully supported Dumbledore during his lifetime and in his death support you just as fully.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Come, Daddy.  Harry doesn't want to talk to us right now.  He's just too nice to say so.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Sir?  May I sit down?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Mr. Potter!  By all means!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: I found what you wrote in the Daily Prophet very moving, sir.  I take it you knew Professor Dumbledore well?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: I certainly knew him the longest, if you don't count his brother Aberforth -- and somehow, people never do seem to count Aberforth.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: I never even knew he had a brother, sir.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Yes, well, Dumbledore was always very private.  Even as a boy.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Sir, I was wondering if you'd had much contact with him before he died.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: The occasional owl.  Though it was strange...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Strange, sir?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: It was the owls themselves.  They often arrived in distress.  It was clear they'd traveled great distances in some cases.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Could you tell me from where they'd come, sir?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: I'm afraid not.  Albus' messages mostly referenced our days together as schoolboys.  They were surprisingly intimate.  When he did speak of his current activities his words would turn elliptical.  Still, I sensed he was under great stress.  Why do you ask?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Just curious.  I was... close to Professor Dumbledore.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Well, he treasured you, Mr. Potter, I can attest to that.  I can also tell you that when a person passes, it's only natural to rue the things left unsaid, to regret the question never asked. I knew Albus nigh on 100 years, but in many ways he will always remain a riddle even to me.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Don't despair, Elphias.  I'm told he's been thoroughly unriddled by Rita Skeeter.  In 800 pages no less.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: That woman is a vulture, Muriel, and you well know it.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Someone has to pick the bones to get at the truth.  I read your obituary, Elphias.  Lovely.  But you did skate over some of the sticky patches in Dumbledore's life.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: I'm sorry you think so, Muriel.  I assure you I was writing from the heart.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Yes, well, Rita Skeeter hasn't made that mistake, I'm sure.  Word has it someone talked to her, someone who knew the Dumbledore family well.  You and I both know who that is, Elphias.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: A monstrous betrayal.  I can only conclude the rumors are true and that she has become untethered.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Who are you talking about?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Well, I don't suppose it'll be a secret once the book comes out. Bathilda Bagshot.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Who?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Who? Bathilda Bagshot!  My god, boy, she's only the most celebrated magical historian of the last century.  Don't they read History of Magic at Hogwarts anymore?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Oh, right.  Slipped my mind...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: She knew the Dumbledores as well as anyone.  She'd have letters, perhaps an interesting photograph or two.  I'm sure Rita Skeeter would have thought it well worth a trip to Godric's Hollow to take a peek into that old bird's rattled cage.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Godric's Hollow?  Bathilda Bagshot lives in Godric's Hollow?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: For years now.  That's where she first met Dumbledore.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Excuse me?  You don't mean to say Dumbledore lived there too?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Of course.  The family moved there after his father killed those three Muggles.  It was quite the scandal. Honestly, my boy, are you sure you knew him at all?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: The Ministry has fallen.  The Minister of Magic is dead.  They are coming...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Nice meeting you, Mr. Potter!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Ron!  Ron!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Harry!  Go!  Go!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Where are we?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Shaftesbury Avenue.  I used to come here to the theater with my mum and dad.  Just popped into my head.  I don't know why...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: This way!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: We need to change.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: What?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1

Harry Potter.text: Severus Snape?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Homenum revelio.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: It's a spell to reveal human presence.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Dear Sirius.  Thank you for Harry's birthday present.  You'd think he'd been born on a broom.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: James says he's got the look of a Seeker, but then James would.  We had a very quiet birthday tea, just us and old Bathilda, who dotes on Harry.  Wormy dropped by late in the day, but seemed down and didn't stay long.  James is frustrated being shut up here, but Dumbledore's still got his Invisibility Cloak, so he doesn't have much choice.  By the way, Bathilda tells the most amazing stories about our old Headmaster. I don't know how much to believe. Can it really be true that Dumbledore --

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Harry!  Harry!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Ron!  I've found him!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Good!  Tell him from me he's a git!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Harry, you can't just disappear. We thought --

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Did she now?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: I'm thinking maybe we should go talk to her.  She still lives in Godric's Hollow.  I'm thinking maybe she could help us.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Harry.  I can imagine why you'd want to go there, but... I don't think Bathilda Bagshot is going to know where Voldemort hid his Horcruxes.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Hey!  I think you two better come down here.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: The two clinging to the tree are Death Eaters for sure.  Dunno 'bout the bloke on the bench. Can't see us, of course.  But we'll have to be careful coming and going.  C'mon.  There's something else you need to see.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Lovely.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: To the Dark Lord.  I know I will be dead long before you read this... I have stolen the real Horcrux and intend to destroy it...

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: R.A.B. was Sirius' brother?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1

Harry Potter.text: Kreacher...

Harry Potter.text: Maybe he knows.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Ever seen this before?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Kreacher, I own this place. Sirius left it to me.  Which means I own you too.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: That was Master Regulus' locket.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: That's right.  But there were two, weren't there?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Where's the other one?

Harry Potter.text: Kreacher doesn't know where the other locket is.

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: But was it here?  Did you ever see it?

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Filthy Mudblood -- The Death Eaters will soon be coming for you!

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
Harry Potter.text: Blood-traitor Weasley --

Harry Potter.movie: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
